The sun was goin down and the wind was picking up iwas freezing so bad this was the coldest I had been at that point. he called me to the bank where he watched and rubbed my shaking goosebumped covered body his hand felt so hot it was like fire on my skin. he said before we head back I should go out 1 more time. I put my dress on my soaked freezing body and gave him the skates and we headed back. I don't remember much of the walk back I was too cold and shock non stop the next morning I was very sick

goosebumps
343
2013-05-25 19:58:57

i was expected to wear as little as possible in the cold all the time. it didn't matter who we were with or where we went or how long we were out I was freezing. very short skirts with tank tops. or short jeanshorts very short sleeveless dresses I wore bikini out many times.

1 time we went on a snowmobile trip with a bunch of his friends everyone was wearing snow suits gloves boots and helmets. I had on heels bikini top and my jean shorts. It was a rather cold day im glad I had a helmet to cover my head. I was shivering intensly before we start I was sitting behind my boyfriend on the same snowmobile.

We rode for an hour before stopping fora smoke. my skin was beat red and I had huge goosebumps. shaking so hard could barely hold my smoke. His 4 friends looked at me in shock for doin this. we headed out again the shivering was so hard I couldn't hold on and fell of in to the snow the whole trip lasted 4 hours it was 1 of my coldest expierences Im pretty sure I had mild hypothermia by the end;)

Callen
350
2013-05-28 09:07:25

Mild hypothermia:

symptoms: shivering, numb hands and other extremities and reduced manual dexterity. Complex skills such as skiing become more difficult, person may feel tired, may argue and become uncooperative.

Difficulty in performing tasks such as fastening up clothing, putting on gloves, a hat etc. or taking them out of a rucksack. A fall in core temperature of only 1Â°C can slow reaction times and impair judgment.

Moderate hypothermia:

This occurs when the core temperature falls below 35Â°C and results in violent shivering and a loss in muscular coordination. Walking becomes laborious and difficult with frequent stumbles, person may fall over.

Most dangerous of all at this stage is perhaps the loss of ability to make rational decisions. There may be a desire to lay down in the snow and sleep ... and even to remove clothing due to an unawareness of the cold.

Below 32Â°C (89.6Â°F) shivering stops as there is no energy left to keep it going, this causes the temperature to drop even further and more rapidly. Person eventually unable to walk will curl up on the ground completely unaware of others, unconsciousness comes at around 30Â°C (86Â°F).

The final stage is profound hypothermia:

In this stage the body has effectively stopped trying to keep itself warm and some final steps are taken to avoid death. The heart rate and breathing slow so that they are hard to detect at all. Only or two breaths per minute may be taken. The skin is very pale and icy cold to the touch. The limbs are stiff, pupils dilate and are unreactive to light. To all intents and purposes the person appears to be dead, metabolism has slowed so far that they are almost in a state of suspended animation. At a core temperature of around 28Â°C (82.4Â°F) heartbeat irregularities may occur - called cardiac arrhythmias - this can lead to an uncoordinated twitching of the heart muscle preventing it from pumping blood properly and so resulting in death. Even if this does not happen, the heart will stop beating completely at around 20Â°C (64.8Â°F) and causes death.

this is from this website: http://www.coolantarctica.com/Antarctica%20fact%20file/science/cold_hypothermia.htm

there are a lot of others.

if, one the other hand, you train yourself, so that you can endure cold a lot longer, then you don't shiver at all in the beginning. it takes you much longer to start to shiver and feel uncomfortable. you can, for example, google Wim Hof, known as the iceman.

Wolfsbane706
351
2013-05-28 21:05:19

On a side note, is anyone willing to give Callen's idea a shot?

gfx
352
2013-05-28 22:22:07

@wildswimmer: yea the anonymity on here is nice.

@lissy w: welcome back my freezing friend :)

@ferfred: I usually wear really short skirts (about 8 in.) and a paper thin tank top that could potentially be see-through if I am wet. I wear a bra and panties only when I'm outside of the house although sometimes, if I am not meeting anyone and just with my bf to go to somewhere nearby, I would go without those also. I think more about how attractive I look more than how cold I am although it is hard not to think of that when your entire body is freezing cold in the middle of winter. Since I normally dress like this inside and outside no matter how cold it is since I don't have any warm clothes, it doesn't take me much effort besides shivering and being freezing cold. My wardrobe does not have any skirt over 10 inches long or any shirt that covers any part of my arm so there is basically no way I'll ever be warm lol

I usually wear low high heels to work (since I'm already 5'10 and my bf doesn't want me to look taller than him) and sandals/flip flops at home and outside.

I tend to dress even less than usual when I am with my bf since I know he loves to feel my ice cold skin. I usually dress very sexy around my friends too because I want to be the one that looks the most attractive lol At one point, I used to wear like a light hoodie covering up my tank top when I'm with my family but gradually, my family are starting to accept my love for braving the cold. In fact, I am currently training my younger sister to dress like me and my bf has confiscated most of her clothes besides skirts and tank tops. I realized she gets cold a lot easier than I do though since I have been dressing minimally for so long and she is still afraid of going outside in a tank top when it is either raining, snowing, or windy although she has been wearing short skirts only for almost a year now.

And for the last question, not really, I am naturally very thin so all I have to do to stay that way is to keep shivering (since shivering is basically exercise) and eat healthy food lol My main focus is maintaining my 16 in. thigh

@mascorta: Yes, my favorite thing about wearing minimal clothes is the shock factor! I love the way you dress :) Try to get rid of the light jacket and the boots though to make your outfit even better.

@Wolfsbane: what's Callen's idea?

gfx
354
2013-05-29 05:41:15

wow that was a sad story mascorta. I'm glad the guy saved your life though. That's why you should never go to a place far away alone without a way of getting home. Usually, when I'm out in minimal clothes, I'm with my bf who would make sure that my body is cold but safe from hypothermia. That's the one caution of wearing minimal clothes, you have to have everything planned out on how to get there and get back home.

I actually had a similar experience once where me and my bf were lost after a dinner party in Montreal. I was wearing nothing but a miniskirt and a paper thin tank top in below freezing and windy weather and we had to walk back to our hotel which was like half an hour away. The moment I stepped out of the restaurant, I was already shivering uncontrollably. My bf said that running might help me get a bit warmer so we ran and I slipped on something along the way. My bf caught me by a piece of my tank top which was so thin that it ripped off. Since my tank top was ripped and I basically didn't have any clothes on, he decided to lend me his jacket so we can make it back. I felt a lot less cold with the jacket on even though my legs were still entirely bare and turned bright red.

mascorta
355
2013-05-29 10:13:14

I wouldn't call it a sad story, gfx.

Actually in the very moment I suffered quite a lot, but I still remember with kindness the guy who picked me up. It might be weird, but recalling the memories doesn't at all feel sad - it was quite an extreme experience and as eventually everything went well I wouldn't like to have missed it.

wildswimmer
356
2013-05-29 20:40:56

I kinda get that - an experience which was pretty miserable at the time seems so different when you look back on it. I quite like it when I, or other people, give themselves up to the elements, by not taking warm clothes, or, like gfx, giving them all away, then going somewhere where you know the weather could turn much colder. I once hiked into the hills and camped by a high lake in wilderness. There was frost on my tent in the morning and I went for a swim in the freezing lake. Luckily I had my sleeping bag in which to curl up and shiver for half an hour afterwards. Then I had the long walk out and back down in my sleeveless top and shorts. Sure I did have the sleeping bag to curl up in in an emergency but even so it felt good. Later I heard there could be deep snow there at that time of the year.

Judging by those definitions I must have had mild and moderate hypothermia many times then. Most times in winter after my run and swim I find it difficult to open the door when I get home because my hands won't do what I want them to. And once I was stumbling back across the field after my river swim - the ice on the field kept cracking and my feet sticking through into icy water. My flip-flops kept falling off and I was stopping, turning and bending down to pick them up, all the time feeling weaker and weaker. Part of me wanted to just lie down on the ice and go to sleep but I kept going. And this was only ten minutes walk from home but there was no one around and wouldn't be for a while unless a dog-walker happened by. I was shaking violently when I got home and all thorough my cold shower afterwards. Now though I look back on that as my best morning this last winter. I'm glad I went that day too.

goosebumps
360
2013-06-04 21:47:22

my freezing bet.

it was around 25 f a little breezy and cloudy. I had to wear a tiny bikini and flip flops. and there was a foot of snow on the grass. The first 20 minutes I had pretty big goosebumps and shivering a little bit. when it hit 20 minutes they dumped a 5 gallon bucket of water over my head I screamed in shock. It took my breath away when I finally caught my breath my teeth were chattering so hard and the shivering was so intense. after that I had to take my flip flops off the wet concrete was so cold on my feet. My wet goosebumped body shaked violently for the next 20mins when they dumped another bucket of water over my head the shaking brought me 2 my knees. They told me it was time to go in the snow I was already so cold but wanted to win. my legs shook so hard I had to crawl in to the snow it stuck all over my wet body as much as I wanted to I didn't brush it off. I alternated between walking and siting because the snow was almost knee high aand it hurt my feet. At the 1 hour mark another bucket of water. Now I just layed in the snow shaking my skin was bright red and soaked. the 1 hour mark also meant 2 of the 4 men lost the bet and I only had an hour to go to win ;) I rolled from front to back as much as I could but my whole body was getting numb I couldn't even stand if I wanted to. After 20 mins laying in the snow they splashed me with another bucket I couldn't even scream my hair was starting to freeze and my skin was getting pale, after this it gets blurry as I was pretty out of it. THey tied my hands to a tree branch at least under the tree there was no snow my feet got a break. as I stood there they threw snow balls at me for the next 20 minsthe snow was sticking to my goosebumps and the shivering shook it off. at an hour 40 mins the last bucket of water. I began to black out here they told me I couldn't stand and my lips were blue. At the 2 hour mark I won the bet and they carried me to a nice warm bath :)

This year I took my girlfriend on a two day trip to the Cologne carnival. We went in train, slept in a tent and spent most of the time in streets. I didn't allow her to take any clothes with apart from her costume - she went as Hula girl: coconut bra, short grass skirt and sandals - nothing else.

It was very cold and she had to dance a lot in the streets to bear it. It was a wild and fun trip ...

wildswimmer
365
2013-06-18 23:42:34

@goosebumps: I often surrender to the weather/nature. It's easier to just not take any warm clothes with me on a trip than try to not wear them. Then I have no choice but to shiver and I never know how bad it's going to be which is exciting. I'd never surrender control to other people though - I daren't even tell anyone about my love of being cold - everyone just assumes I don't feel the cold much and I certainly do all I can to keep up that pretence even when I'm freezing, unless I'm on my own when I can let go and give in to the shivers which is a lovely feeling. It must be nice to have people with whom you can enjoy being cold, but it would be nicer still to have someone with me who enjoyed being cold too.

@All: Does anyone enjoy being cold with others doing the same? And do you have competitions to see who can be coldest for longest?

goosebumps
367
2013-06-21 01:32:09

Ive had a lot of competitions in the cold with a few girls

1 that comes to mind is 2 girls and I were brought to a frozen over lake. We had a few rules only 2 pieces of clothing. No socks, no winter attire, legs arms and belly had to be bare. I wore a bikini. 1 of the other girls chose heels and a skirt and the last girl wore flip flops and shorts.

We got to the lake and parked at shore and walked on to the ice it was around 15 degrees and super windy. the ice froze my feet and the wind stung. we were all shivering by the time we got to the middle of the lake. The girl in the heels fell on her butt 3 times by the time we got out there.

Standing out there in the open with the strong gusts of wind (the nes said wind chill was -5) we all shook uncontrollably I kept sitting down to rub my bright red feet. (I should of chose shoes lol) after 5 minutes the girl in the flipflops went running back to the car slipping on the ice a few times. Just 2 of us left and the guys threw snow balls at us the other girl didn't last long with the wind and cold snow on her bare skin. She took her heels off and ran back to the car. I laid on the snow and let the guys rub me with snow before walking back :)

yes many more ice skating stories and I was sick for about 2 weeks with a high fever and cough but that didn't stop my freezing fun

goosebumps
371
2013-06-26 20:35:59

The worse I endured while sick

It was early in our relationship I wasn't used to freezing yet. It was Christmas Eve and we planned to go to a cabin in northern woods until New Years (the cabin only had a wood stove not much heat) I had a cough and slight fever which mad my shivering nonstop.

The day we left I was wearing the dress I planned for new years it was red very short thin dress that just covered my butt it was backless and cut low in front also slit on the right thigh. I also wore stiletto heels. We drove the 3 hours with out heat in the car I shook the whole way the last half of the drive my teeth chattered very bad. when we got to the cabin the snow was so deep we couldn't get up the drive way so we walked. that short walk in the deep snow in those heels sucked my feet were so cold and the shivering made it so hard to stand. When we got to the cabin I shoveled off the deck while he started the fire and got the cabin ready. After shoveling I got to sit by the stove which made me feel like I was on fire.

We planned to exchange gifts in the morning and I had a special treat planned for his gift. I woke up an hour before he planned to wake. I opened my suit case (he didn't know this but it was empty except for had cuffs.
I wrote him a note saying "For your gift I will go nude this whole week and you can make me as cold as you want with no safe word. you will find me on the porch" before this we had a safe word for me if things got too extreme I could warm up. I walked outside still feverish and cough getting worse shocked to find out it was only 10 degrees it was gonna be a tough day. I walked through the deep snow to the car and locked my dress and shoes in trunk they were my only clothes I was shaking so bad I had to crawl back to porch. once on the porch I locked my leg to porch rail with the hand cuffs and waited for him to come get me luckly it was only about. 10 minutes until he came out.

I was already so sick and so cold and had the whole week to go when I planned this present I wasn't sick and I wasn't expecting it to be so cold. ill continue story soon.

yes I did many interesting things for my boyfriend what do you mean?

my bikini was always very skimpy

ill share some iceskating with friends stories soon

when he came out he warmed me up a bit and went back inside to eat his breakfast. I layed on the snow covered deck handcuffed to the rail. The shivering would only pause when I coughed which was getting worse. He came out again and rubbed my goosebumped body 1 of his favorite things to do I tried to hold back the shivering and chattering teeth but couldn't. After a bit he went from rubbing me with his nice warm hands to rubbing me with snow. I only got a break from the snow massage when we would have a smoke. As it reached noon my skin was turning from red to blue and loosing all feeling so he released me and we went inside for lunch. He sat me next to the stove when feeling started to come back I felt like I was on fire and my whole body hurt. When we fini. shed eating lunch my skin was turning back to its normal color but was still cold to the touch and covered in goosebumps my head felt so hot from the fever.

After lunch we went for a walk.

I was still shivering in the cabin before we went out. when I woke up the next morning my skin was still cold to the touch and outside temp was 4 degrees my cough and fever was getting worse. I had 6 days to go it was gonna be a long week

I just layed on the hard snow shaking covered in huge goosebumps and chattering teeth I tried rubbing my body to give a little warmth but my icy fingers didn't help 1 bit. After about 20 minutes that felt like a enterity he came out. pleasured me in the snow to give me some warmth. I thought he would bring me inside for a break but left me there when he got cold and went in for some warm coffee. he watched me from the sliding door as I shook violently in the snow when he came out he brought me a glass of ice water to drink I thought my chattering teeth would shatter the glass. I could only take 1 sip it made me feel even colder. He then poured the water on my chest I let out a scream of shock and shivered worse then he rubbed my body with the 5 cubes of icy before carrying my blue goosebumped body in for lunch.

2013-07-06 21:02:04

back inside I layed on the floor shaking by the stove for over an hour before my skin was back to normal and feeling started to come back. With my cold I was really becoming miserable but he was having so much fun so I didn't complain or ask to stop. I got up to the table to eat a quick lunch still shivering.

After we ate we went back outside I thought he would give me a break but I was wrong. The wind had picked up and a snow storm was coming in. I was still cold before going out side so I was shivering with chattering teeth instantly. The brutal wind and blowing snow made my freezing worse he had me sit on deck and cuffed my leg back to rail. I curled up in ball trying to get any warmth I could. So he layed me back in the fresh snow and cuffed my hand to another rail so I couldn't curl up after a couple minutes he went in and watched from the door as I shaked helpless laying on the deck in the blizzard. After a bit he came out and brushed the snow off of my goosebumped freezing body and massaged me his warm hands felt like fire. Then he took a shovel and started throwing snow at me as I layed there. There was nothing I could do but get covered in snow. I tried thinking warm thoughts but the cold was to brutal.

Wow! Amazing! I said wild swimming was the best way to cool off. It can thoroughly chill you even on a hot summer's day. How much cooler can it make you in winter! When you come out and you're in snow. I can stand quite some time in cold unmoving air, but five minutes in freezing water is enough to make me shiver for half an hour. I thought he'd send me to the road like this but he wasn't ready yet: he put a gag in my mouth but not one like the ones I knew: this one was like a ring of plastic that kept my mouth open, not closed! Then he took a marker and wrote something on my chest. I wanted to know what he wrote but with the gag I couldn't speak but Steve led me to the bathroom where i could read it in the mirror: use my mouth - this $%!@ won't bite. Now I understood the gag. Anybody could just put his $%!@ into my mouth and I had no chance of doing anything against it!

This was finally the moment when I was sent outside. I think I had never felt as vulnerable as in this moment. Naked, tied up, with my mouth open and no chance of running away with heels on and my feet tied together.

I started walking - obviously slowly. A couple of minutes later a car came up the road. I managed to duck behind a parking car. When I tried to get up again I fell on my side into the snow. It was difficult to get up again with my hands tied. I went on walking until I reached High Street. I hid behind the corner and waited for a moment when there were only few people. I was lucky that there was nobody waiting at the bus stop. Someone must have seen me from a distance when I crossed the street but noone followed me. I was like only 200 yards away from home when suddenly two guys came out of a parking car I just had passed. I hadn't seen them. I had no chance of escaping. They grabbed my arms and looked at me and the writing on my breast. One said this is an offer too good to refuse. After they finished they pushed me on the floor, took the rope between my feet, made an additional knot leaving only about two inches of rope between them and drove away. It was so difficult to get up with my feet tied so tightly. When I finally got up I had snow over my whole body but wasn't feeling too cold because it had been so difficult to get up. I had to do mini steps now and it took me a long time till I reached our home. I was freezing when I reached the steps that lead to our door. How could I possibly get up there? The only way I could was by sitting down and moving up step by step backwards. When I knocked at the door and my Man opened I was so happy - you can't imagine how!

For me this was a really wild day. Not everything had been pleasant but overall it was an incredible experience.

@Coalburner: Welcome back to the thread. In regards to the freezer, it all depends on what you want done with it. Or rather, what he wants done with it. If you just want it for general purposes, then a smaller one will be fine. coalburner
410
2013-07-26 10:58:50

@Wolfsbane706: Glad you still like me telling my experiences - even if the focus is not always on the freezing.

Here's another one (I already posted it under another topic some time ago - I hope you don't mind) and it's more about freezing than the previous ones, it occurred on the day of a terrible snow storm in December 2011.

I work as cleaner in private homes, usually right in our area but I have a client who lives like 2 miles away and I used to go there by bus.

It had already been windy at the morning but around noon when I finished, the storm had really started. As for clothes - I was wearing very little: platform shoes, a sheer shawl around my $%!@ and two small pieces of fabric hold together by a fixing pin on each side as skirt. Except for the shoes I could have been completely naked - it wouldn't have made a difference. When I left my client's home I started to freeze almost immediately. I'm used to a lot but this was bad.

When I got near the bus stop I just saw the bus leave. This line runs every 15 minutes, so I wondered what I could do meanwhile. I decided to walk two bus stops along the line, there would be one with a shelter. Whilst I was walking my skirt was constantly blowing up so I was practically completely exposed the whole time. There were very few people on the street so I believe it were mostly people in their cars who could enjoy the view.

In the shelter I was slightly more protected, so I could stand it somehow. When the bus arrived if was so packed it didn't even stop. The same happened with the next one. The third one finally stopped and I could get home. When I arrived my Man was first a little bit upset because I was late but when I told him what had happened he didn't even punish me.

At night Vinicius, one of my Man's mates, had come over for some video games and complained about the weather. My Man then mentioned that I had been outside barely dressed before and told about my previous experience. I was glowing with pride at this moment but Vi said I couldn't have done it if hadn't been for the shelter and not now when there were not a few rain drops but more wind, really heavy rain and even some snow so they came up with bet where I would have to proove that I was indeed capable of staying outside for a good while.

The terms were quickly fixed: first I had to choose clothes that would offer no protection. I changed my platform shoes for some completely open high heeled sandals and I chose a fishnet top and skirt. The skirt was only held together by one knot at each side.

I would have to walk around the block knocking at the window at each round. It's a big block so it takes a couple of minutes to do a round. If I gave up before the sixth round my Man would have to pay Vi 5 quid for each round missed. Six rounds would be a tie and every round more would mean 5 quid for my Man. Actually I was afraid of going out with this weather and having to give up early and humiliating my Man. On the other hand it felt really good that my Man had put so much trust in me.

When I stepped outside the wind was so strong that I was almost blown from my feet. The icy rain and snow hurt terribly but I was decided to give my best so I started my walk. The first round was terrible and I wasn't sure how to finish it. There was absolutely nobody on the street to see me. Even if my skirt hadn't been blown up constantly neither the top nor the skirt did hide anything as they were just half an inch wide holes. And if there had been people it wouldn't have mattered - I lost any sense of modesty quite some time ago.

During my whole walk I had to stop from time to time behind a lorry or a tree to rub my tummy, arms and legs.

When I reached home for the first time I felt completely frozen, my teeth were shattering and I nearly felt like giving up but I said to myself that I couldn't let my Man down and that I made one round and that I'd be able to do another and so I did.

The second one was physically tougher than the first but I wasn't as scared as before anymore and I didn't even consider giving up.

The third one wasn't actually that bad. I had become somewhat used to the cold, the wind, the rain and snow and I was starting to feel good about myself, about my endurance. At some point to cars passed along the street. The drivers must have seen me but there was no reaction.

The forth was even better. I was feeling really confident that I was going to win the bet for my Man and I started to think about the great sex I would be having afterwards.

With the fifth things started to get difficult again. I was really suffering from the cold and instead of resting every two or three minutes I had to every one or two minutes. At some point I thought about fingering my nipples and $%!@ to get some internal heat but it didn't work: my fingers were just to clumsy and cold.

What kept me going during the sixth round was that I knew that afterwards my Man wouldn't be losing his honour because of me but my feet had gottten really cold. The soles of my sandals were really thin and my toes started to hurt quite badly. Anyway there was no way I was going to give up before making my Man at least a bit of money although my stops had become more and more frequent.

When I was about to finish the seventh round I knew that the next one would be the last one but I decided to make it special. When I knocked on the window and the two guys were looking I took everything off: top, skirt and shoes and stuffed it into the letter box. I knew I was doing the right thing when I saw the guys' faces when I started round 8.

I had thought that there wouldn't be much difference between the little clothing before and being completely naked, yet there was: my feet were getting colder in direct contact with the ground but on the other hand it was better that my toes were actually moving now.

When I finally reached our home I was really finished. I just had to go inside. When they opened the door and I came in I nearly fell down shivering. I don't know how long I had been outside but it was surely almost an hour and probably more.

I was again allowed to have a warm shower which I really needed. What the guys needed at this point was some relief so I gave them blowjobs while still in the tub.

To my surprise I didn't even get a cold or anything after this day. I think the constant movement helped a lot. Maybe it's also that I have acquired good resistance against the cold

I am still totally proud of what I did and even thinking and writing about it makes me feel hot, wet and horny. Actually I'm quite happy that now it's summer but in a certain way I'm looking forward to the next similar experience.

And yes: I got our big freezer. Getting it to our home was quite something but has nothing to do with cold. I have to admit: I see the thing in our flat now and I'm kind of scared (but terribly excited too). I have no idea what kind of plans my Man has with it but it will surely include a lot of freezing.

430
2013-08-09 11:46:57

Hi there:

That's how my training started:

day 1 - Fri 26th July

Before I actually got into the freezer my Man ordered me to take my shoes off. This almost never happens. Clothed or naked - that is actually most of the time - I always have to wear my high heels, even when I'm sleeping.

I then stepped into the freezer and without my heels it's just as high as I am. As it was a hot day at first it felt good and fresh but then he shut the door and it was suddenly totally dark and the only thing I could hear was my own breath and the freezer's motor.

This wasn't the first time I was in a dark box so I didn't panick or anything like this but still my heart was beating like wild as I had no idea of how long I would have to stay inside.

At first I just stood inside, breathing in the cold air, feeling the cold from the floor slowly creeping into my feet. After a while my skin started to get cold and I rubbed my arms. I could feel goosebumps on them. The freezer is big but there's no space to run around or making gymnastics or so. There was not much I could do to keep me warm but to get on my knees and touching my nipples - which were very hard at this point - and $%!@. Especially when I'm on my knees I come very easily. I just have to imagine to be sucking my Man.

This helped but a good while and several orgasms later I was quite exhausted. I had squirted once or twice on the floor and it started to freeze. Touching myself didn't help that much anymore and I started shivering. Still it wasn't too bad yet but my feet and knees had gotten very, very cold. I squatted on the ground and wrapped my arms around my legs and tried to avoid any contact with the walls. My teeth were shattering badly at this time.

From time to time I rubbed my feet and I also lost my balance a couple of times, this also because the floor had become slippery from my frozen juices and I guess also from condensed water and I started to feel dizzy.

Suddenly the freezer's door opened and my Man pulled me out. He then informed me that I had been in for two hours. When I was able to stand up I put on my shoes and went into the sunshine at the back yard. That was nice but I had to cut it as it was time to prepare dinner.

day 2 - Sat 27th July

Over night my Man had turned the freezer's temperature to -5C. I didn't have to work on this day and after I had taken care of all my duties at home and my Man had had his lunch, I had to get back into the freezer.

At first it didn't really feel colder than the day before. This time I got into the squatting position right with my arms around my legs right from the beginning and I decided not to start too early with touching myself. I waited until I was shivering a lot. This time it took me a while to reach my first o and after it I didn't start right away again and again as the day before but I took a break before starting again. I think that was a good idea, still it was very cold and I noticed the temperature difference.

After some time my skin felt numb and my feet hurt from the cold that was creeping in from the ground but I felt that I was still able to stay on for a bit when suddenly the door opened. Outside stood my Man with three of his mates. I looked at him and didn't notice when one of the guys suddenly threw a bucket full of water at me. I screamed when the water hit me. It was terribly cold and it even had some crushed ice in it. Instinctively I wanted to jump out of the freezer but they had already colsed the door again and kept it shut. I heard the lock clicking for the first time and I knew there was no way out.

I was completely wet from hair to toes. I dried as good as I could. My teeth were shattering terribly. This was tough, I can tell you. On the other hand, with the shock and everything I didn't feel my skin's numbness and the pain in my feet for a good while.

I don't know how long it took but when the door opened again I had a lot of ice in my hair and I think I was close to doze away. After they pulled me out I got a good spanking as punishment for trying to get out of the freezer when they had thrown the water at me. Spanking on really cold skin hurts a lot.

During the night I had a lot of rewarding activity though.

day 3 - Sun 28th July

Since Sunday I'm not longer allowed to open the warm water without permission. As my Man takes personal hygiene very seriously I often shower various times a day. I had already been used to using only cold or lukewarm water - but using no warm water at all is something you have to get used to.

Temperature stayed at -5C but as a direct consequence of my escape attempt I now get my hands cuffed behind my back before going into the box (how we call it now).

I had many things to do on the day so there wasn't a long single session but I stayed in four times for an hour or so. I think in terms of training this is pretty good.

I will keep posting my training diary from time to time if you like it and I don't bore you with it (and I find the time. today we're on day 15 and we reached -10C already.). I would just like to make a point: unlike others here I don't "like" the cold - actually I enjoy hot weather, sunshine and hot water. I just like to be able to stand it and I love it to please my Man, to make him hot for me and to satisfy him. In the end the fun is all about sex, not just about being cold.

Last thing - my pseudonym: I chose it when I opened the account. I had just moved out from my dumb mother's home and one of her stupid friends called me like this. Since the New Year I wrote about most people call me $%!@bunny, snowbunny or just bunny. Added by my Man: $%!@, twat and $%!@ are also good names.

@Wolfsbane706 - I liked your comments on my posts, so I asked my Man regarding video. He said he would possibly make some video from time to time but he didn't really feel like sharing it with "my wanker friends" ... sorry for now.

late fall while I was still getting use to being cold my boyfriend suggested that we should go for a hike the next day for the whole day. He said I should only wear 2 items of clothing my choice. It was warm for that time of year so I agreed thinking it wouldn't be too bad. I picked out my clothes the night before I thought of wearing a dress with flip flops. But chose to wear my bikini top and short jean shorts instead and go barefoot. I chose this because I knew he likes the goosebumps on my belly and when I go bare foot.

I went in and put my clothes on and we drove to woods for our hike. he never puts the heat on in the car so I was shivering the whole way there. Every so often he would blast the air conditioning to make me shiver more. it was so cold that day he was bundled up in boots thick pants heavy jacket gloves and a thick wool hat. I was just in bikini and shorts.
The sky was cloudy so I got no relieve from the sun and out in the woods there was a strong wind. It warmed me up a little but I was still wet and it was going to be a long day to be continued...

@gfx: I pulled off a very similar stunt as a surprise for my bf's birthday in February. The difference was that I drove the car with AC on and picked him up for a football match he so much wanted to attend, but it was sold out - however I had been able to get two tickets from a friend who works for a newspaper. He was very pleased when he opened the door and saw my outfit - even more so when I showed him the tickets: I had told him on the phone that we would go to a restaurant, but as soon as he realized that we would attend an outdoor event his eyes widened. It gradually occurred to him that I would be outside for several hours in subzero temperatures and wind wearing just a crop top and miniskirt, and his surprised gaze turned into a mischievous smile, the same smile that always made a warm wave rush through my already shivering body ;-) I was quite excited among the heavily dressed crowd on the stands and my summery outfit of course got me some attention, thus I didn't feel the cold at first although I had been shivering even more since I left the car. Towards the end of the game a drizzle started, the temperature had dropped by another few degrees, and for almost three hours I had been mostly standing, although jumping and cheering at times, in the cold damp wind. I didn't fall asleep, but I was quite exhausted, and the tickle in my throat I had felt in the morning had developed into a slight cough, which I was not sure how long I could still manage to stifle - on the other hand, my bf really liked (and it turns me on) when I would try not to cough, and finally fail, haha! I was shivering in waves, had huge goosebumps on my bluish skin, and my teeth were chattering that I could hardly talk, only interrupted by an occasional sexy (stifled) cough ;-). I could barely walk in a straight line although I hadn't drunk. On our way back to the car my bf put his arm around my waist to support me. We didn't turn on the heat so back at home I was even colder, but at the same time I felt hot inside to such an extent that we had to seek some, uh, cooling in the frosted garden ;-)

I can only imagine what you two are doing when you wake up (and during breaks in your sleep as well, haha)

Hello all again!

I am glad to see this thread has returned!! I was afraid that this was starting to die! I am glad to see that I am not the only one that has this, well I guess you can say "interest." I have always been seriously turned on by cold girls specifically goosebumps. I love chattering teeth, shivering, the stuttering that comes with etc. but to me nothing is better than feeling a girl's arms with goosebumps so intense and cold it almost hurts after a while to rub!

It's still pretty warm here in eastern USA, temperatures in the 80s so not a lot of extreme cold situations yet. However with the air conditioning so high in some of the buildings and the girls wearing so little that can come in handy in some situations! ;)

I am taking an advanced writing and philosophy course this semester as part of the $%!@ Laude program and I went to the first day of class about 6 weeks ago or so. I sat down and the room was approximately 66 degrees, so a chilly room for most, perfectly comfortable for me. I put my books down on my desk and lo and behold, an extremely attractive girl walked in the room and sat down in front of me.

She was blonde, very tall and slim but still quite well built. She was I'd say about 5-11 and had long arms and legs. Her shorts were clearly too short for her because I could see her lime green thong sticking out, and her black bra strap out of the side of her white tank top. She sat down started rubbing her arms and legs. I saw huge goosebumps all over ever single inch of her body, her arms, back, legs, and somewhat exposed chest area which were all mostly bare. She also had probably the hairiest arms I have ever seen in a girl which is always a massive extra turn on for me as well.

I could hear her teeth chattering as she tried to warm herself as best as possible. She spent most of the class period rubbing her arms and trying to not make her chattering teeth a loud distraction. Her arms especially were coated with goosebumps to the point where I thought it almost looked as if the inevitable prickling sensation must have been painful until she would shudder and they would get even bigger and more intense. Her arm hair must have been sticking out a full inch or more especially on her forearms. When it came time to introduce ourselves to people sitting near us she turned to me and we started a conversation. I noticed she just crossed her arms in front of her and tried not to shiver her goosebumps clearly giving away how cold she was until she eventually gave up and through extreme chattering teeth told me that she was sick, and was having hot and cold flashes. She said she woke up that morning extremely hot and since it was late August and about 95 degrees decided to wear as little as possible.

Well she continued saying that she realized as she got halfway to class she would probably start getting chills, and didn't bring a sweater or jacket. In the heat she said that she started to feel actually cold in the 95 degree heat, to the point where she had goosebumps. When she walked into the ice cold building she basically couldn't get anywhere close to warm and was trying to not shiver loudly to distract others. Since we just met I didn't try anything obviously. But when she showed me her right arm I couldn't resist but touch it, and I have never felt anything like that ever.

Not a bad way to start out the year! Unfortunately that is the only cold story I really have so far! People just don't get cold here yet like you'd expect!

I'm with Txbossman on the video ideas too! Videos showing chattering teeth, goosebumps, shivering etc. anything! I am not even sure where to start because youtube I think I've pretty much exhausted trying to find anything.

wildswimmer
464
2013-10-03 22:21:24

@daewongkim: Yes, you should definitely pursue her. See if you can persuade her to continue dressed like that as long as possible into the winter.

@shiverfan: Good to see you back! Did you ever finish telling us about Elizabeth? I think you should meet goosebumps - she sounds so much like your Elizabeth.

@coalburner: How's your training going? Do be careful of frostbite - please.

I find this time of the year, when the temperatures are falling (at least in the northern hemisphere), very interesting. It is fairly obvious that different people have different comfortable temperatures, ranging from 27C (80F) for people from hotter climes to around 12C (54F), below which they will cover up their arms, legs or both. On colder mornings I see people dressed so differently, and I wonder which of those still with bare limbs will continue to bare their arms or legs well into the winter. Probably very few. If you see the same people each day you can see when they finally cover up. Only rarely have I seen a girl in a strappy top at 2C, a guy cycling in a T-shirt at 3C. Maybe some of them are just optimistic that it will still warm up later. How many times have you heard that phrase, I've brought it along "just in case it gets cold"? I have always taken the opposite view and gone without in the past unless it was really cold and horrible weather. This winter though I have no choice since I got rid of all my long-sleeved clothes last Spring. I rarely become ill though and I put that down to my not wrapping up warm giving all those germs somewhere warm to breed. I'm surprised you others get ill so often. I really don't see what's so sexy about a red streaming nose and a hacking cough.

The best and longest video I saw was one that Joyce posted a link for long ago: http://xhamster.com/movies/404854/trial_by_snow.html . The girl appears to be really enjoying it, though gets she fed up by the end and you can skip the last minute or so because when she's telling us she likes being cold, now all wrapped up in a coat, you can tell that she doesn't mean it. In fact the whole latter half is best watched with the sound muted. I love the way her skin slowly turns blue all over.

@Wolsbane706 I am doing wonderfully! I am not seeing a whole lot of goosebumps/shiver action yet but hopefully that changes soon!

I would like to share another story if that's alright!

So this happened a few weeks ago with one of my close friends.

We were hanging out one evening, and she asked me if I would like to come over to her apartment and I agreed. I arrived and we had a nice evening together doing various things. She is a shorter, stouter girl but has very pretty face, and a very nice body. She isn't terribly susceptible to cold unlike most of my female friends so I usually don't think of her as a big target for cold action. But this night was quite different!

She was wearing a tight short sleeved t-shirt and shorts despite it being about 40 outside. She wasn't planning on going out so she just dressed like she would for a day inside. We were watching a movie and I noticed about halfway through her arms were crossed tightly and she was shaking. She had enormous goosebumps all over her arms and legs. "I'm freezing" she said and went to get a blanket. She came back and a few minutes later started shivering again, with even bigger goosebumps and her teeth were chattering so when she said how cold she was she couldn't even talk normally. So she had to get up, put pants on, grab her winter coat and a think blanket on top of that and her teeth were still chattering. About an hour later she warmed up and actually got hot like she usually is and stripped down to just a tank top and shorts again. But about a half hour later probably the worst shivering episode I have ever seen erupted as she physically couldn't be still from shaking, she had goosebumps like I have never seen and her teeth couldn't stop chattering to save her life. She had to grab a long sleeved shirt, a sweatshirt, a winter coat, and three blankets and still was shivering.

When I left that evening she walked me to the door, hugged me and kissed me on the cheek as she usually did. Even though she was covered in goosebumps and shivering her skin felt warm, so I assumed she was having a fever. When I talked to her the next day she said she had a 104 fever and goosebumps never left her skin all day long. She had the early stages of the flu. Well she eventually recovered and we're still good friends now, and she has gone back to her always hot self!

So that was my most recent story, I'm just curious does anyone else also find that even though it is in a way rather sadistic, when someone is sick especially with a fever and feels so much colder that is sexy?

2013-12-16 01:56:40

Friday night and Saturday afternoon were very cold here in Montreal (-21C/-5F and -27C/-17F with wind chill). I spent several hours outside with bare legs, the wind was freezing especially in the old port, but I love the feeling and I didn't suffer from the cold (except that my knees were red). Sometimes even in such low temperatures I meet other bare-legged people in the streets, however this time I didn't see anyone with uncovered legs.

GoosebumpsForever
507
2014-01-04 12:30:27

Hi, Thanks for sharing all your amazing stories from the cold winter! I have never seen any lady braving the cold in Sweden, where I live, like you do; gfx, lissy and mascorta! On the other hand, we can enjoy amazing moments in spring time when the sun starts to shine after the long winter and people gather on the rocks near the coast, trying to get some sun tan.

You know, the sea water is quite salty up here and there is a saying that you get a more “vibrant” sun tan if you first take a plunge in the salty water and then let the wind dry your body so the salt crystals remains on the skin. The sun rays will then reflect in the salt and the tanning will be more intense.

Therefore, on the first warm and sunny day in spring you can see ladies (all ages) forcing themselves to get into the chilly water, 10-12 C (50-54F) just wearing minimal bikini and then getting up covered in goosebumps! They stand up and let the water evaporate before they lay down to warm the body in the sun. The goosebumps come and go on the skin as the temperature varies in the winds! After an hour its time to add more salt and the bravest ladies take the second dip for the day and get even bigger goosebumps as the body is colder than the first time.

Yesterday here in Nashville, it was a dreary cold, gray, and rainy day. It was probably about 38*F here yesterday afternoon. I was at the Aldi store down in south Nashville when I observed an attractive woman there wearing SHORTS!! It has been such a long, cold, drab, gray winter here that it was certainly a treat to see a great pair of female legs completely bare for no apparent reason! To whomever you are, thank you for wearing shorts yesterday. You certainly brightened up my day! It was freezing cold yesterday, and drizzly, too. I was wearing layers myself. It definitely made my day to see that woman wearing shorts!

wildswimmer
521
2014-02-09 23:47:43

@wolfsbane - yeah, notifications stopped before Christmas - I though this thread was dead...

@firepoint - I was stranded at the wrong airport in the US just before Christmas and the plane left with my baggage leaving me in just a polo shirt and sleeveless fleece at 21F (-6C) and a few inches of snow. I had to wait a few hours at the airport before I could leave. Imagine my surprise and joy when I saw a young woman who had just arrived by plane walk out of the terminal building wearing the shortest white shorts you can imagine and the flimsiest silver flip-flops. I watched with interest as she walked out into several inches of slushy snow, her near bare feet disappearing beneath the icy slush. She never even hesitated. Not sure where she was heading - not for a taxi. I later managed to travel by bus and train to finally reach my destination the following day, spending several hours in cold railway stations. Someone even offered me a jacket but I refused. Earlier in the week I had walked around a frozen lake in a sleeveless T-shirt. It was sunny at 17F (-8C) with some wind at times. Everyone else was so wrapped up. I wanted to go for a swim but the ice was too thick. It was a lovely day. I'd never had bare arms in such low temperatures before - it was great!

@gfx: I think it's really incredible that you've stuck to your dress code all winter in such low temperatures. I guess you've given yourself no choice since you don't own any warm clothes. People must give you the strangest looks. I'm so pleased you're enjoying such low temperatures. Here in the UK it's really quite mild, though very wet.

My name is Nadine and I leave in Switzerland (sorry for English mistakes). I have been married for 10 years and our couple is doing great. I found the topic on that forum very interesting as it relates to my own experience and issue.

After being married , I quickly realized that my husband was much more happy when I was wearing skirts and dresses than pants. To please him, I stopped completely wearing pants (not a single one in my wardrobe today). Then, he told me that what he would really like is me to go bare legs at all times. This is what I have been doing for many seasons now, summer is OK as most girls do that, but winter is of course an issue. The trade-off I could find is to often wear knee-high boots with my skirts as opposed to usual open female shoes, meaning that my feet and ankle are usually covered and only my thighs are left bare. I found that wearing boots makes a huge difference when it is really cold, it is much more manageable.Bare feet in snowy wheather is one of the worst thing I can think of. The photo that was recently posted with the girl wearing a pleated skirt with snow on the ground is exactly how I have been dressed many, many times...and you REALLY feel the cold when dressed like that, from the bottom to the very top of your legs, believe me. Even if you dress like this everyday, you don't get used to it and you hate those moment when you'll have to stand outside, like waiting for the bus, in the cold. Forget about the wind that makes things 10 times worse.

Are they women around who have the same "soft pressure" from their husband ? Do you, like myself, feel "unconfortable" because dressed in an appropriate way (specially when with other woman who really dress according to the wheather and ask you questions) ? More practically, how do you manage when it is freezing cold?

If you are a men with the same envy as my husband (which I fully respect), why is this so important to you ? Does it make such a big difference how your girlfriends are dressed ?

Macaw!
567
2014-04-03 20:49:25

I'm a firm believer that anyone can enjoy the cold once they've got used to it. It's like exercise, people are generally lazy and don't want to do it. But once you get into the swing of it, it becomes fun and makes you feel full of energy all the time. The same goes for the cold. If I've been cold recently, I feel much more energetic for the next few days. It really annoys me when people say being cold can make you ill (or even kill you - WTF? - we're warm blooded, even if we feel cold on the outside, we are always warm inside.) Cold makes you healthier, it toughens you up. It also burns 400-800 calories an hour on top of whatever you're already burning if you're exercising aswell. And if you're lazy, then just laze around in the cold and burn calories with no effort!

Macaw!
587
2014-06-23 17:48:59

I have a freezer for myself - both to cool off in summer, to shiver in winter, and believe it or not to lose weight - being cold burns a LOT of calories with no effort at all. Take one decent sized chest freezer, line with rubber pond liner (not the cheap plastic stuff, the thicker rubber version or it'll leak if it gets scratched, I use the same stuff for my garden pond, it's cat claw proof). Fill freezer with water. Buy a thermostat with waterproof remote sensor (as the freezer's one doesn't go high enough and the water will freeze solid) and plug the freezer into it. Put the sensor between the liner and the freezer wall (so it's out of the way and isn't continuously underwater - it says waterproof but I've heard that before). I put it on a thin plank of wood so it's not touching the freezer wall, but instead touching the liner. If it touches the wall it'll sense it much colder while the freezer runs, this way it gets the water temperature. Set to whatever temperature you like. If you want below zero, add salt to the water and mix thoroughly, you can get salt water to -21C if you put enough of it in! Site the freezer near a TV set so you can sit in it for hours without getting bored.

GoosebumpsForever
618
2014-09-11 11:31:56

Absolutely Wolfsbane706, we are all different!

I think the hypothermia process is something like this:

When the body can't keep its ideal temperature, first reaction is to develop goose bumps to raise the body hair. Second, blood vessels near the skin will contract to prevent blood from being cooled off near the body surface. That is why we look pale while freezing. Third, the body starts to shiver to produce more heat. Fourth, body stops shivering and all internal organs slow down and we finally become unconscious.

So my perfect girl should just get huge goose bumps but keep her healthy skin color and not turn pale. Your perfect girl should reach much further in the hypothermia process, so she constantly shivers but should not get so low core temperature that she passes away, of course!

It takes a lot of experience to control how much hypothermia you want to get, I believe. But experimenting together with a girl of the right stuff would not hurt! I found a scientific paper about hypothermia, that might give some clues:

http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1841707/pdf/brmedj02134-0031.pdf

Here is a HD video of a nice girl freezing and shivering during Navy Seals combat training. Watch 8 min into the clip.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6t5VBcwJlQU

\GBF

Macaw!
619
2014-09-11 14:00:26

Hypothermia is overrated. We're supposed to handle different temperatures. Shivering is just us keeping warm, it doesn't mean we're too cold. You wouldn't say your house is too cold because the boiler thermostat comes on. It's maintaining the temperature.

Also, 37C is standard body temperature when relaxed. 36C makes us shiver. 20C or less makes us die. So shivering is one SEVENTEENTH of the way there and no cause for concern.

GoosebumpsForever
620
2014-09-11 14:39:16

I agree Macaw, shivering is not necessarily dangerous!

Danger may come when core body temperature drops several degrees, like after an “ice mile swim“ in +3C water!

If we could find the optimum temperature in the house, so that our girls shivers all day long in their skimpy clothes, it is perfect!

Hi everyone!

It's been a while, I have been busy to post, but I have been following this post carefully! ;) I modified my user name just for more anonymity purposes.

So I have always had a HUGE thing for goosebumps. I think they are the sexiest thing in the world, and the sensation of running your hands over them, feeling every single hair standing up gets me going like no other! I still am searching avidly for videos and pictures of goosebumps and girls freezing cold. However, I also am finding that something almost equally arousing for me is chattering teeth. I love it SO much when a girl is shivering so hard you can hear her stuttering, hear the clacking sound of her teeth from a mile away, and inevitably, she HAS to have goosebumps!

I thought I could share an instance I have run into recently that highlighted something like this:

I walking in the city and waiting for the train to take me back home. It was a crisp, cool evening, about maybe 50 degrees or so and quite windy. I'm sitting on the platform, and all of a sudden, a beautiful girl walks up. She had rich, flowing blonde hair, was about 5'10" or so, large breasts, and sexy as hell! She was wearing an extremely short sleeveless, strapless blue dress that because she was so tall looked even shorter since they barely covered her butt. She sat down, and I could see HUGE goosebumps all over her arms, chest, and legs right away. She had a lot of hair so the goosebumps were huge and the hairs stuck out like a full inch! She rubbed her arms to try to stay warm, but as the wind blew, she would get these huge shivers, and her teeth would start to chatter uncontrollably. Well, the train was very late, and she kept getting colder and colder. Eventually her body looked like it was convulsing, and her teeth were chattering so loudly and so hard I thought she was going to break a tooth or something. Then it started to rain, and as it rained because it was a bare platform, she got even colder which I didn't even think was possible. I brought and umbrella and motioned over to her to sit under it with me to stay "dry" which she eagerly accepted. The train ended up about about an hour late so during that time we just talked and got to know each other a bit. Eventually she was so desperate for warmth she was willing to cuddle with basically a stranger, and the beautiful goosebumps never left her arms even the whole train ride back. As we got on the train I could still hear her teeth chattering and see her whole body shivering like crazy. I certainly hope she warmed up eventually because I thought she was on the verge of hypothermia, but am I a terrible person because......I'm sort of glad she didn't when I was around? ;)

True story! I hope you enjoyed it!

Hey guys I read something not realistic but entertaining randomly, http://www.experienceproject.com/stories/Drive-Nude-And-Walk-In-The-Woods-Nude/2394299?n=0&aok=Confirm

I Drive Nude And Walk In The Woods Nude Young Girl's Extreme Winter Nudity Experience At first I have to start with me, that this project requires to give also self-experience. I have practiced winter nudity many years, but not regularly. There have been some pauses. I have been lucky to share winter nude walk with some girls, like here: http://www.nudeimagehost.com/viewer.php?file=56243058045088081241.jpg. This is my photos and my car can be seen in picture. In previous winter I began from 1st January and then every weekend, but not only the coldest (4-5 Feb), from which I wrote main story later. Longest time was at 26th February 1 h 47 min and temperature in this day about -4-5 (23-25 F), but sunny. Feeling of cold is not the same every time. Generally it can be very different. But normally after some 30-40 minutes is the warmest moment, then you don't feel any cold. After some 1 h – 1h 15 min body started to feel colder again, but not too much. Nevertheless that means body have already frozen and feelings will be maybe better later, but interests of the health you must finish nude winter walk. I must admit, that I walk in winter not totally naked, but with ski hat, gloves and sports shoes. But until 2010 december I didn't know that there is one girl, who had practiced winter nudism since five years old and had achieved much better results, that anybody can imagine. I met her accidentally and very luckily – this was during one of my many winter naked walks. On forest trail I suddenly saw, that somebody is coming towards me. That was not surprise, because I have met some people during the walks, only reactions have been different. But now I was bewildered, because I saw naked girl coming on the same track. Obviously we talked some minutes, because seeing other person do same thing is interesting. Unlike me girl was totally naked – not even shoes, barefooted. She allowed me touch her skin, and it was shockingly warm, although she told has been about hour in forest. After conversation she give her cell phone number, because she told, that her parents don't allow her to go naked walk and I maybe can help to fulfill her dreams about extreme winter nudity. Briefly her story was, that father exercised her from 5-year old get used to cold. She ran in snow and then spells were every time longer. At 8 years old she was able to spend about hour naked in winter conditions. But when she became 9 years old in next winter, father said: „No way you go naked anymore. Until now we continue steeling in swimsuit only.“ Girl claimed, that it was not same experience anymore and she started later secretly go to walk again stark-naked, as it was on day of our meeting. She was 13 then. If some our winters were mild, then 2011 February was cold. And we agreed, that in 24th February, which was holiday, girl says to parent that she have one event with friends, but actually she will take record naked walk in this day despite of temperature. And it was cold day: about 10.45, when starting, temperature in forest was -19 (about -2 F). Our aim was to walk 2 hours and I was dressed warmly in contrast to girl. Only I insisted, that she have to start with shoes and then decide, when to continue barefooted. But it was sunny day and temperature was rising every minute. I check it out now and it was -15,8 at noon and -12,4 at 1 p.m. Look temperatures here. (http://www.emhi.ee/index.php?ide=21&ts=1298541600&go=4). As I expected, girl was not feeling much cold and took the boots off soon. She said, that barefooted is simply more comfortable. After two hours she said, that its not a problem to continue experience, but we finished at 13.22. It means 2 hours 37 min. Our last winter was in the beginning very mild, in December not even below zero temperatures (32 F). Girl was talking, that in this winter she tries to do something extraordinary, what she have never done – to spend all day naked outside. But she was waiting colder temperatures to get this experience more harsh. At the end of January it was quickly getting colder and weather forecast predicted extreme cold – about -25-30 (-14-22 F) in morning and maybe -20 afternoon. When I called to girl, she was very excited and almost overjoyed about prediction and we choose 4th February to this naked day. Look here temperatures in morning: (http://www.emhi.ee/index.php?ide=21&ts=1328421600&go=1). Girl insisted, that all walk will take part only in her terms. 1) Walk starts approximately at sunrise and finish at sunset, it was from 8.13 am to 4.42 p.m. 2) All clothes and also boots must be left in car. She asked friend with to witness her experience, but it was mistake, because we had problems with other girl. I asked my friend to came and recording all activities as the evidence. Morning was extremely cold. All ski events in this day were cancelled, and it took 5 minutes to get car started. I put maximum clothes on: special winter boots with two pair of socks, two pair of trousers, shirt, blouse, sweater, jersey and warm jacket, special wool hat and gloves. Experiment girl's friend had somewhat less right clothing and problems started. Walk began at 8.11 – we reached right time. At temperature -30,5 (-23 F) girl was feeling extreme cold at first 20 minutes. She said, that breathing was not ok, but she tried to improve the situation. Also she was walking mainly in thick snow, because the surface layer of snow was colder. Often she jumped into snow, and made some exercises, herself lying in snow. Weather was not getting any warmer to 9 a.m, only a little bit (-30,1). And then it happened – naked girl's friend said, that she can't stand the cold longer. My friend had to go immediately to cottage (our walk's half-point and finish point) with other girl, and we agreed to meet again at half-point and then he continues filming. The sun began to shine between the trees and girl's self-condition improved slowly. „Now the harder part is over and hopefully I can soon enjoy my walk,“ she said. „But it was really cold, I didn't expect this. It is pity, that my friend didn't withsstand.“ About 10.30 we reached near river, which was partially ice-free because of sources. I suggested girl to swim a little bit, because in this case water temperature was warming her. She was really happy in water, splashed and swam. When she came out of water, she was warmed up. „What a great pleasure,“ she said. „I am here middle of the winter and now began to feel comfortable.“ After 11.00 we reached a small village. We wanted to include some public nudity experience to winter walk. Girl was again very excited, but she didn't know yet reaction of the people, which later made her cry. One older lady was first to notice us. She didn't believe her eyes and started shout and ran out of our way. After that news about naked girl spread throughout the village and despite of cold weather more and more people came out of the house. One man asked: „Is it joke or something? What you are thinking himself?“ We explained, that girl is doing experience and will be naked all day. Then another one pointed: „If she stands cold, as you said, why she don't wear panties or swimsuit? How old she is? It is inappropriate and ill-mannered behaving from such young girl!“ Girl was feeling like devastated. Nobody said anything about her courage. Girl tried to say something to protect herself: „You don't understand, that I am not feeling shame being naked. It's your problem.“ But it was like oil poured into the fire. People get more angry and somebody named girl a *. And then poor girl started to cry: „I am not a *!“. We had to leave village quickly. For me it was unreasonable, that NOBODY said anything about girl's courage, only they repeated like robots: „Wear panties and bra!“ Absolutely irrational situation: girl was going naked on -25C and people even were not surprised! Poor girl felt cold again, because she was devastated about people's reaction. She was all shivering and I offered to finish experience and to give her some my clothes and go quickly to cottage. But girl replied: „No! I can handle!“ She did some quick yoga exercises and strongly focused to eliminate the feeling of cold. And that 5-minute effort was worth of it – girl was not shivering anymore and forgot disappointment of people's response. We arrived to the cottage at noon. Temperature was now „only“ -21. My friend and girls friend, now warmed up, were waiting and also temperature inside cottage has reached until +10 (52 F). I asked: „This has lasted almost 4 hours. Come in and put the clothes back on!“ „No!“ replied girl again resolutely. „But I need some rest after walking over 10 kilometres. Bring something from house, on which I can sit!“ We brought chair and also made for her hot tea. Funny, if someone had seen this weird situation: warmly dressed men enjoy brief stop on house and let naked girl to sit outside! But these were the rules. Other girl had some talk with experiment girl and when she came back to house, she told: „Kate was very upset about people's reaction, but she is really brave! She is happy now and warmed also.“ We made rest some 25 minutes and then continued walk to other part of forest. We had to go through snowy path and then trail over frozen marsh, which sparkled beautifully in cold weather. It was southern part of natural park. „It is like wild beauty, more interesting part of trip. You can maybe enjoy a nature,“ I said to girl. „I never had been here,“ she answered. „But I have heard, that is beautiful.“ „The sun heats a lot,“ said girl after some 4 kilometres, when we arrived on trees-free marsh. „I am now hot again.“ This was like miracle – girl really have not anymore frozen body. At 2 p.m temperature was rising to -19 – warmest time in that day. We soon started our way back through other way, but before that we met one biologist (woman) skiing on marsh with son and daughter, about the same age as our girl. Kate was little bit frightened again, but biologist was very kind-hearted and praised girl. „See, how good health she has. But my children are so often ill and not prepared. Therefore I took them today to nature, though warmly dressed,“ laughed she hilariously. She never mentioned absence of pants, although her boy was present. „This is quite an achievement,“ she says about girl's extreme winter experience, but was not really stricken. „If to practice, everything is possible,“ she concluded calmly and we leave biologist family. End of our trip was too routine, there was nothing more to describe. We finished exactly according to plan at 4.42 p.m. After sitting some time in cottage and Kate getting her clothes back we leave at home again. There were difficult moments, but she get over and kept her promise.

lornagalma
667
2014-11-13 11:00:26

Thanks Goosebumps,

I am trying to answer all your questions:

How do you prepare for a cold day? - I don't do any special preparation, I use moisturising creams all year as my skin is a bit dry, so I use more of them in winter as my naked skin exposed to the cold gets drier. And before going to bed I select the clothes I will wear the next day - I have a nice collection of shorts and short skirts!

Do you also have low temperature in your home, so you are always used to low temperature? - I live alone and I am always naked in my appartment. I am not very rich so I try to save money on heating. I turn it off most of the time and as the walls connect to the neighbours who heat, my flat stays quite warm (aroun 18-19 C).

Do you always have goose bumps when you are outdoors in the cold and does it happen that you even shiver occasionally? - Sometimes I have goosebumps but not that often, don't know why. It happens that when I leave my house I get goosebumps immediately but then they go away. I do shiver only if it is really cold.

Can you avoid that hands and feet hurts and get numb because of diminished blood flow? - Most time I wear open sandals but when it's below -5 C I wear warm shoes. My hands get numb, I can't avoid that.

You have practiced a lot to reach your level of cold resistance, haven t you? - As we were poor when I was a girl my mother could only by cheap tights for me that I hated so I preferred to go bare legged even in winter. That was my practice.

I can hardly wait for this winter!

There is one story that is very kind to me: when I was 20 I used to live with a woman (I'm bi). She lived on a hill. One day in February I was in town. I needed a bus to get to home (her place). But it snowed so heavily that the bus was cancelled. It was also cold. I wore a sweater and leather shorts. The shorts stopped just below my bottom. I had a pair of open sandals too! And of course I didn't wear anything to cover my legs. I started to walk up the hill with 2 girls who also needed the same bus. It was good exercise upwards but I was still shivering. They were sisters and kept asking if I was cold and why I was dressed like that. I explained that it was my usual outfit. In a covered bus stop we sat on the bench to take a rest and they saw the goosebumps on my shivering naked legs. So they started to rub and massage it. One took her gloves off, the other one kept her wool gloves on. It was so good as they massaged my bare legs. They didn't even stop at the top of my thighs ... When they saw that I enjoyed it they invited to their place which was closer than my friend's. We had a really good time - you can imagine what we were doing :) I even met them later 2 times but then they moved to Germany.

Hi Lorna. You're right, you only need to keep your body core warm, doesn't matter about your arms and legs. Let them enjoy the fresh cold air. Try a cold shower first thing in the morning. That'll make it feel warmer for a few minutes afterwards, just enough time to give you that confidence to leave that sweater at home as you leave home. Or why not give your sweater away now while it's still mild? Leave it behind a friend's sofa or take it to a charity shop.

And who was it who said winter swimmers put warm clothes on when they get out of the water? I run home in vest and shorts and bare feet. I only wear flip-flops if it's icy too avoid cutting my feet. I don't even get dry as I don't take a towel.

Macaw!
691
2014-11-17 18:14:39

Wildswimmer: Actually, I find it's better NOT to keep your core warm. If your core is covered and your hands and feet are bare, you get numb fingers/toes as your blood is moved away from them, as they're the coldest part of you. If all of you is equally cold, you don't get numb bits, you just shiver (which I enjoy).

Wildswimmer: I run to a lake (1.5 hour run over grassy mountains), swim for a couple of hours (any time of year), then run back. I only wear speedos for the running, and nothing for the swimming. I love running back as my upper body shivers like mad.

wildswimmer
704
2014-12-06 00:40:26

The girl at the pizza place I visited this evening to pick up our take-away pizzas was wearing a thin short sleeved shirt, the corporate uniform. It was 4C outside and there was a strong draught blowing in through the wide open door. Her arms were covered in goosebumps. As she took my order her hand was shaking so violently she could hardly write. She kept smiling at me when she spoke. Her male colleagues all wore long sleeved shirts under the short sleeved uniform but she didn't. Very occasionally she went back where it was warmer but soon came back to stand in the cold draught to take more orders. After ten enjoyable minutes my pizzas were ready. She handed them to me, the warm boxes perhaps offering a brief relief from the cold, and smiled and wished me a pleasant evening. I wished her one too, hoping it would be as cold as the last ten minutes. She must have known how cold it would be. Perhaps she was enjoying her shivering shift. I, also in short sleeves, walked out into the cold night air to the car to drive home.

Last night as we started to watch a movie she went up stairs and changed into a little nighty. We keep our house pretty chilly to save on heating cost. So as we sat on the couch she was covered in goosebumps. She really hates being cold but will suffer through it for special nights. We dont smoke in the house so we had to go out in the freezing cold to smoke. The night air had to be in the teens i was cold all bundled up and she just wore her nighty and a light hoodie. Every smoke we had she shivered more and her goosebumps got bigger. As we layed on the couch i massaged her lovely goosebumped legs which sent more chills through her body. After the movie we went out for a last smoke before heading upstairs. She left her hoddy in the house i massaged her shivering arms as she sat on the cold concrete. As we went upstairs she had 1 finally treat for the night, she grabbed a bowl full of ice for a lovely ice massage. Rubbing a beautiful shivering goosebumped woman with ice cube after ice cube is a sexy sight. Near the end she was shivering so bad. We had fun as i warmed her back up. ;)

2014-12-29 15:39:13

Few days ago we were at house-party (we live in the Middle Europa). It was really cold then (around 5C) and was also raining all the day. Everyone was dressed in long jeans and long-sleeve blouses, pullovers and sth like this. At the beginning however a couple came, he was dressed like others, but his girlfriend wore mini-skirt, high boots (just below knee) and tank top, which was even unable to cover her belly when her arms were up (she took off the jacket). She had no thights, her legs were totally bare, even despite it was so cold outside and they come by bus.

She didn't seem to feel any cold, just was sitting with others and having fun, but seemed that other haven't notice she didn't has thights. Only when her boyfriend caught her in full-nelson and some of ger friends started to tickle her underarms and belly, one of them tickled her thigh and shouted "hey, you don't have tights!".

After some drinking we went to the club, still by bus. In meantime it started to snowing. We were all fully clothed, while she had to face it with her bare legs, but she didn't have any problem with it. When we were coming back from the club, there was enough snow for making snowballs and obviously her legs were main goal, especialy as her boyfriend had to come back earlier and two of the guys were holding her hand while we tried to hit her legs or belly.
