At the supermarket the other day, I was lucky to see a nice looking girl at checkout who seriously regretted her choice of uniform that day. She wore a blouse with very short, folded sleeves and her checkout desk was located close to the entrance of the megastore.

It was quite cold even for us customers with winter coats and I could see that her arms were covered in goose bumps. Every time there was a short break in her work with scanning the goods, she tried to warm her upper arms with her hands. She tried to move her hands so that it looked as if she naturally happened to touch her arms, but result was that she really signaled that she was freezing badly!

That employee would deserve double salary for that performance!

Today, round midnight, it is prime time for all goose bumps to show up on all bare arms and legs that hopefully are suffering in the harsh winter night while we watch the fireworks! We wish them good luck!

daewongkim11
734
2015-01-24 15:54:15

Hello everyone! It's nice to be back after so long!

@shiverfan thank you so much for those wonderful pictures! Your model was absolutely stunning, she had a gorgeous face, and a gorgeous body! I couldn't believe though that I couldn't really see any goosebumps though, she must really be tough! :)

Since I haven't contributed in a while, I do have a story I'd like to share that happened a few days ago.....if that's ok of course! ;)

I have a close friend that I live with who is a beautiful, very sexy young lady, and everybody knows it. She's about 5'7", long flowing brown hair, gorgeous eyes, and a fantastic rack with excellent legs. But she also has no cold tolerance whatsoever which is always a plus! A few nights ago we were out and about and it was nice out for once. I'm from the Northern United States so it's usually really cold, but it was about 50F which was very surprising. She wore a light black cardigan and a sleeveless sundress underneath since it was sunny earlier and compared to what we had been having, was unseasonably warm even for her. As we walked around and did our thing, the temperature started dropping significantly. I could see goosebumps on her bare legs all through the evening but she didn't complain or anything other than the occasional "I'm cold."

We went to dinner around 8pm and when we came out of the restaurant around 9 the temperature had dropped to about 25F and got very windy. The moment we stepped out, she shrieked and a massive shiver overtook her body. She crossed her arms tightly in front of her trying to get warm and the goosebumps on her legs got even bigger. Her teeth started chattering and I could see her body shaking uncontrollably as we tried to walk but it was getting hard for her to even do that. I wasn't wearing a whole lot myself but cold doesn't bother me much so I offered her my jacket. She refused it though saying through chattering teeth that "I was the idiot that decided to wear this outfit, so I should have to deal with it!"

Because she was so stiff from shivering and the cold, walking was difficult and she was already to begin with.......not the most coordinated person. We had just gotten a foot of snow a couple weeks ago and because it got drastically warmer it mostly melted, creating a lot of big puddles and melting snowdrifts. But since it cooled down below freezing that night for the first time in a few days, some of it froze making it very slippery. As she tried to walk, she slipped and slid feet first right into a huge puddle. She was fine, but she was soaked to the bone. I pulled her up and she was dripping wet all over. Because she was wet her shivering was even more intense, her teeth were chattering even harder. She took off her cardigan because that was the most wet and she knew that even though her arms would be bare, it would be better than wet clothing chilling her skin. But since she was wearing a sleeveless dress, all of her arms were exposed. I kept her as close to me as I could the entire walk back to our apartment, her arms were covered in huge goosebumps, and the shivering never ceased.

When we finally got back to our apartment around 10:30pm it took her hours to warm up. Her teeth chattered for about an hour, and her body stopped shaking around midnight. I'm not sure if the goosebumps ever went away. Basically I spent the night keeping her warm, as she did have mild hypothermia. It was definitely a most memorable evening! :)

Sorry I'm kind of long winded, but that's my story and yes this did happen a few nights ago! I hope you enjoyed it!

This includes me and our 4-year-old daughter. We also have a 6-year-old son who is allowed to undress at home as he pleases but is not under any restrictions.

When away from home, I live with the understanding that being clothed is a privilege. Anyone at any time may ask for part or all of my clothing and I must give it to them. I am allowed to dress as I like for the elements, but often I end up totally naked in winter. My husband takes me to strip once a month on amateur night and I have to give up my clothes to the audience and go home naked. In cold weather I am allowed a blanket in the car but not to walk to or from the car. This is good for me as it builds up my resistance and immune systems and reminds me that my purpose in life is to serve others. My personal comfort is not important if the way the cold forces my nipples "to attention" is pleasing to others.

blitzguss
763
2015-03-14 14:58:59

I've lurked on this site for a while and although I appreciate how the long-term exposure to cold can be a turn-on I am much more interested in the short and shocking contrast between hot and cold! For example I went for an early-morning run two days ago. It was sunny but cold and I wore only shorts and a t-shirt (plus trainers). I was a little short of time so I pushed myself around the 4 mile course and was pretty hot and sweaty when I got home, despite the cold air temperature. When I got in I had very little time to shower and change for work. I put the shower on its coldest setting and stripped off on the balcony to let my running stuff dry. I then got straight under the cold shower and washed thoroughly - I like to use a really tingly mint shower gel and scrub with a body brush all over. By the time I had finished I really felt amazing - hot and cold at the same time and incredibly turned on, though I denied myself a climax! I really felt incredibly fresh and invigorated for the rest of the day. I would really love to hear from others (particularly women) who share this kind of enjoyment of very intense "good for you" sensuality and I could write some stories in this theme if of interest.

gfx
790
2015-07-05 19:45:56

Hey guys, so over a year ago, I remember being on this forum. Basically, I had been roleplaying as my friend (I hope some of you would forgive me). My friend (well call her Kim which is her last name to make it easier while she remains anonymous) and I used to go to college together and I would always envy her skinny body and her ability to go bare legs every day despite the cold weather. In a way, I always wanted to be her and thats why I was roleplaying online :(

In case you want to know who I am, I am a 23-year-old Thai girl living in the US. During my freshmen year of college, I joined a sorority where I met Kim and back then, she was already going bare legs and often bare arms outside in the winter. We were roommates and I noticed that her closet only had short shorts and miniskirts and tank tops and loose sweaters but absolutely nothing that could cover up her thighs or any form of jacket. So naturally, I was very curious how she does it so I started asking her and she told me A LOT of stories because she was obviously very proud of her body and ability :) In fact, most of the stuff you guys ask me here, I go ask Kim and she tells me stories and I kinda write them out while envying her haha. She was really a very brave girl, she barely got sick despite wearing short shorts and tank tops the entire winter and even when she was sick, she dressed the same just to look sexy and please her bf... I wish I could do that.

Anyways, I started getting very intrigued by her stories and kind of envious of her and I actually told her this so she started training me, within a few months, I lost 15 pounds of weight from 135 pounds to 120 (61 kg to 53 kg) through exercising with her and following her diet. However, once I hit 120 pounds, I had a hard time going down further to her weight, which is 110, so I was still not nearly as skinny as her (plus, she is 5'9 while I am 5'6). So unfortunately, my BMI never made it to the underweight category although I got really close. She also trained me in wearing less during the winter but that didnt work out too well since I have such low endurance to the cold I could start shivering in stores during the summer from the AC :( Anyways, she made me wear one of her short shorts and go bare legs with her on a cold winter night when it was about 20F out. I opened the door and started shivering instantly while she didnt shiver until a minute after and she was wearing a paper thin tank top as well while I actually had a jacket on so it was just my legs that were exposed. I felt very sexy that night and we had an emotional girl talk at a park but she could tell I was shivering uncontrollably and chattering teeth a lot more than her despite being dressed more and after about 20 minutes, I wasnt able to walk straight anymore and I felt like I had a huge headache. So I asked Kim to go back but while we were walking back, she kinda had to drag me because I had hypothermia by this point. She had a hard time dragging me because she is so thin and was shivering a lot herself as well! So she called her boyfriend to come help out but it took him a while to come so I was already pretty sick by then. We made it back to the apartment somehow and her boyfriend helped out with me but I still ended up going to a doctor in the morning who yelled at me for not dressing well.

From this experience, I realized trying to go bare legs in the winter like Kim was a bad idea but I often dreamed about being able to show off like her. Unfortunately, my family is from Thailand where the average temperature is like 85F/30C and anything below 75F/24C is considered cold. In case you didnt know, Thailand is very close to the equator so I mustve gotten genes that were terrible at baring the cold. Also, I noticed that most of the people in this thread are from northern Europe such as Germany, Austria, and UK so that is consistent with my belief. Now dont get me wrong, I love my country and my people but I just wished I had better genes for this. Also, during my senior year when Kim became the VP of our sorority chapter, she started this new competition where all the girls had to stand outside on a cold winter night in our sorority tank tops and short shorts for an hour. I remember I surrendered in about 10 minutes because it got unbearably cold for me. And there were 2 girls that went could barely made it past 2 minutes, this Egyptian girl and a this girl from Singapore because they have even worse genes than me for braving the cold. Only Kim and this half Russian half Siberian girl made it through the whole hour and there was this German girl who got real close.

Anyways, sorry for the long post and for posting a picture from the web back then (it was actually from a Thai site haha). I think someone messaged me asking for a pic of me (or in reality, Kim) so I asked her if I can take a pic of her to share with people on the internet and she firmly said no. But I didnt want to be a let down so I tried to improvise rather than reveal I am writing in place of my friend. Shes currently working in Seoul now at a luxury fashion store but she came back to the states to visit her friends like me during Thanksgiving (which she allowed me to take a few pics of her here without her face) and just yesterday for July 4 and that was when I remembered this site.

http://s24.postimg.org/6cp6mtzqt/5020_A.jpg http://s24.postimg.org/6tsrs8h11/5021_A.jpg

In case you guys wanna know what shes up to, she still hasnt worn anything that covers her legs since then but she hasnt been wearing tank tops in the winter unfortunately since that is viewed negatively and not acceptable at her job in Korea. She said she enjoys the states better because there are actually a good amount of girls wearing short shorts and mini skirts in the winter in Seoul so she doesnt stand out as much haha

802
2015-07-29 18:51:36

Thanks Coldness13 for posting the video with the models in ice sculpture house! Great performance, but I am curious if the still photos that were taken maybe caught some goose bumps!

I was lucky the other day to see few ladies freezing during a sightseeing boat trip in the archipelago. The boat cruised for four hours and during the trip the air temperature dropped from 25C to 12C. All seats were outdoors on deck and some young ladies were dressed in short shorts and crop tops, expecting a warm and cozy evening on a sunny boat deck.

Unfortunately for them, but good for me, they were severely mistaken! When the sun set and the night breeze started to blow they suffered badly in the cold. They tried to huddle in their seats and did not brave the cold at all. The cold made weak creatures of the $%!@y beauties! Unfortunately, they were offered blankets from the deck assistant after too short time of suffering!

A true summer girl does not let us down so easily. She gladly wears minimal clothes despite a cold summer night because all admiring glances from people around compensate any discomfort from the cold. Wouldn t it be nice to see a "summer girl challenge" where the challenge is to look attractive and relaxed despite chilly weather in summer. The candidates should wear a minimal summer dress and sit on a terrace during a cold, windy and humid evening that we often have here in north Scandinavia. They must ignore that they are freezing so no attempt to huddle is allowed. The wind shall tantalize their bodies and challenge their mind. A candidate starting to look annoyed goes out. Neither shivering bodies, nor chattering teeth are allowed. These are signs the candidate is no longer in control of the situation, which a true summer girl always is. I would love to see the goose bumps and all attempts to discreetly turn their bodies in the chair trying to alleviate the discomfort from the agonizing cold air biting their skin!

Those who like to see shivering girls, I suggest that the candidates having to leave the challenge because of shivering should continue in a different group where the mission is to stand the cold as long as possible no matter how the body reacts!

Will probably take some time until that is an Olympic discipline!

Hello everybody,

Some of you may know me from the Shivergoosebump Yahoo group and/or from my youtube channel where I post videos of myself shivering. I am a young man, however, so that type of shivering isn't what everybody is looking for.

I just read through most of the thread and really appreciate all the links to photos and videos and so on. I will continue reading but I was too excited to finally find this thread that I had to respond.

At the bottom of this message, I will link to my youtube channel if anybody wants to check it out. All of my videos show me shivering heavily, but like I said I am a young man and I am baring a lot of skin, so it may not be for everybody. I will have to check and make sure my "Cold" playlist is public on youtube so that everybody can check out all the videos I've compiled throughout the years of shivering and cold women. I will also like to my Flickr page where there are some photos of me covered in goosebumps, but I also have photos of girls with goosebumps I've taken in public, plus some sexy photos of friends and my additionally my aunt, who I can't help but become aroused by as she is a violently sexy middle aged woman.

I've found a ton of great shivering videos on Clips4Sale, but I've had to root through and waste a ton of money on bad videos as well. I can provide links and so forth for those videos for interested parties.

Sorry for the long post, just wanted to introduce myself and share what I have available. I've been turned on by goosebumps and by watching girls struggle with the cold for as long as I can remember and it's nice to finally meet some others who share the same feelings.

coldjuly
906
2016-08-26 13:03:33

Happy to see people appreciating my kinda crazy clothing style and not just insulting me being a $%!@ or telling me I'd be dumb and wouldn't pay attention to my health. :3 So if you have any questions for me, just feel free to ask them. c: And yes of course I can tell you more:

Last New Year's Eve I went to a party at a friend's house. He gives a party at New Year's Eve every year, cause he has a huge house with a big garden and no neighbours we could disturb, since his house is literally in the middle of nowhere.

I wore a white, backless mini dress with quite a big cleavage and some high heels. No underwear or socks. To get to the party, I had to catch a train for a 30 minutes ride and then another 30 minutes walk from the train station to the location. As soon as I left the train goosebumps immediately covered my bare bodyparts. It was a freezing evening(approx. -3°C / 26°F) with some chilly wind. Since I was already late to the party I took of my heels, so I could walk faster and warm up a little. Surprisingly the asphalt was warmer than I expected for my bare feet. I arrived at the party just a little cold. It was around 10 PM and the party was great. I took some shot, drank some wine and danced a lot. Someone arranged a huge and very beautiful firework at midnight. I was a little drunk.^^ At around 3 AM most of the guest left the party and one kinda handsome guy asked me, if I'd like to spend the remaining night with him. Of course I said yes and he took me out to his expensive looking black convertible. As we both sat down he asked my where my jacket is. I answered "I don't need such things."

He was a little confused but he started the engine and accelerated. Soon after that I pressed the button to remove the sundeck. Now he was very confused since it got even colder(like -9°C / 16°F) and there was a icy wind coming from the sides. We then had a little chat about various things and I really started to feel the icy cold. My whole body began to shiver and my skin slowly turned into a blue-ish color. Cause i wasn't wearing any underwear, you could clearly see my breast under the very thin, white dress. After roughly 40 minutes of driving through the night he stopped at a nice looking lake, you could clearly see with the moonlight. It was so quiet there. The only thing you could hear were my chattering teeth. :D We sat down on the sand near the lake, which was very frosty. I could feel all the cold through my dress, which was so short, it barely covered my butt. I was incredibly cold at that moment, but he was nice to me I don't wanted the togetherness to end. As we sat there and talked he really was paying attention to my frosty shaking breast, which was fine to me. I mean a woman should show her property. ;)

He then asked me to come to this apartment and maybe have sex together. I don't wanted to drive all the way to his apartment, but sex was a good idea. I mean he was handsome and it really heats up the body. So I laid down at the backsea... and yeah you know how this works. :D After that, I asked him to drive me to the next train station. We said goodbye and I sat down waiting for the train. It was a really small station, so I was the only one there. After a couple of minutes I started to shiver again heavily. My goosebumps were like at maximum level and I even began to sneeze sometimes. It was 4:30 AM and the timetable said the next train comes in 10 minutes, which I was happy about cause I froze enough the last hours. After 30 minutes still no train coming. By the time passing by I really had to pee. I double checked, if there really was no train approaching and went around the corner to the grass and "sat down" to pee. And it was like a bad comedy movie. Of course a train was coming in exactly that moment. I really hurried up, but it was too late. The train driver didn't stop for me.

Frustrated I ran to the timetable, where I saw the next train comes in 70 minutes. I was literally really $%!@ed, since I accidentally peed on a small part of my dress. :D :D I had to wait in this arctic cold -10°C / 14°F. And this icy wind coming from all directions. I only wore an extremely short and very thin dress. Nothing more. It was just too cold for my body. After an hour my whole body was shaking uncontrollably, my teeth were chattering so hard. My whole body, even the covered parts, was blue-ish and full with goosebumps. My limit was reached. As the train arrived 20 minutes delayed my arms and legs where almost numb. It was really challenging to walk. Man I was so frozen. Inside the train it felt like a sauna.^^ So yes that's it. Was an exciting New Year's Eve. And despite the freezing cold and the bad luck, i was happy with that day/night. :)

Story was a little long. Hope thats ok for you all. <3 Btw. I realized I really like writing this stuff down. I even got some goosebumps whilst writing this message. :D

(Again. Sorry for any language mistakes. I do my very best.)

xo July

2016-08-31 18:36:50

wow, its crazy how I came across this forum, there's almost 1000 posts of people sharing their stories :)

so I guess I'll share mine too - I'm Eunice and I'm in Toronto.

It all started when I was 15 and wore a pair of really short shorts on one warm summer day. I was a freshmen in high school and that day, I got compliments from the most popular and hot senior guy in our school about how long and thin my legs looked. I am 1.80 meters (which is really tall for an Asian girl) and I am pretty leggy (my legs are 1.1 meters long) but I had not realized wearing short shorts would make me so attractive until that day (I also got comments from many other guys and some girls as well).

So I decided to wear only super short shorts that summer (like 15-20 cms where it barely covers my bum) but when autumn came, I didn't want to let go of the short shorts and the attention. I persuaded my mom to let me where them for longer and as the temp continues to drop, my legs started getting colder and colder and I got a lot of goosebumps. When winter came along, my mom would not let me wear the short shorts because she said it was too cold for me but I did not want to give up. We reluctantly came to a compromise where I could wear short shorts with knee-high socks and boots (so I could still have bare thighs). It was not bad because it was still very cold and I still got goosebumps on my bare thighs because I would walk to and from school for 20-30 minutes each day in freezing weather (like -10C) and hang out outside on most days for longer. And since I was the only girl with sexy bare thighs covered in goosebumps the whole winter, I got even more attention from guys :)

When I moved away from college, I basically threw out or donated everything that covered more than 18 cms of my legs and all the socks and boots and instead bought a lot of high heels to make my legs look even longer. I also started dieting constantly and working out to tone my legs to make them even thinner. Throughout college, I liked to wear shirts or sweaters that were a bit longer so that they completely covered my super short shorts to make it even more sexy because I looked like I was going completely bottomless. I stopped wearing panties so literally all I had on my legs was a pair of paper-thin super short shorts. I wore this with 12=15 cm high heels even during the winter and had to do it even when I was sick since there was nothing else to wear :) Since it was a huge campus and I was outside a lot and I keep my room's temperature at around 10C, my legs were basically always covered in goosebumps and freezing cold to the touch. I had my limits tested many times (there was a day when it was -25C and I still had to go outside with completely bare legs). I got an unbelievable amount of attention from some of the hottest guys as well.

After college, some of my friends suggested I go into modeling but I decided against it mainly because I want at least a little bit of privacy in my life and decided to teach instead. Unfortunately, as a professor, we have some sort of stupid dress code but I always bypass it by walking into the campus with a modest skirt and then taking it off as soon as I'm out of sight. I noticed that my classes always end up being predominantly male and basically all of them have their eyes on my bare long thin legs during class and probably don't pay much attention to anything else haha

Welcome to the thread Cold Lover - it's called psychrocism (https://drmarkgriffiths.wordpress.com/2012/07/04/ice-ice-baby-a-beginners-guide-to-psychrocism/) - it's a mental condition that we, the followers of this thread, all experience. I won't say "suffer from" because I don't think any of us suffer - we all rather enjoy it - maybe we only suffer when it's too hot! You say you like seeing girls who are cold but do you yourself like being cold? That's how it started with me. Around age 7 I realised I liked being cold. My teachers used to ask me if I was OK when I took my jumper off to go outside at break instead of putting it on (my mother used to knit me jumpers!). For a long time in my teens I used to wear more clothes than most in fear that someone would suspect my fetish, but into my 20s and more so as I've got older I wear however little I want to (as decency allows). I also like being wet, especially being in cold water - I only ever have cold showers and love being out in the rain - and go swimming in lakes, rivers or the sea at any time of the year. but of course I love seeing women being cold, whether by choice or accident. I've never actually met any female who shares my passion and this thread seems to be mainly men who enjoy cold women, like you, too, as well as several rather unbelievable story tellers. Yes, this is the only place I've found full of amazing accounts (there were even more but the guy who posted them deleted them).

I was sitting in class a few days ago and the most beautiful asian girl walked in (I happen to have a massive thing for most asian women) and sat in front of me. She was slender and I would say about 5'8." She was wearing a black tank top and short grey shorts. Class then started and about 20 minutes in she started rubbing her arms really hard. Every 5 or so minutes her whole body would shiver and she would get more goosebumps. By about the 45 minute mark I could see her teeth chattering and they probably chattered constantly the rest of the class. After class was done she was shivering so hard she could barely pick up her things and her teeth were chattering so loud. I accidentally acted on my instinct which was to hug her (I usually restrain well) and I freaked out a second apologizing and she grabbed me back and said "I'm so cold and you're warm" after about a minute she left and bid me farewell until next week. (It's only a once a week lecture) Let's just say I have never looked forward to a class so much!

I just wanted to share another story with you all: So it happened last March at a very rainy day/night. The weather in March in Germany is not that cold, but you hardly get above 10C(50F) at daytime. I put on a black, very short mini-skirt, a sleeveless top showing off my bare midriff(without any underwear), and some heels and went to a disco in downtown, where I met my boyfriend.

It was not really cold that evening (around 8C or 46F) and I only had to walk 20 minutes, but it was pouring outside so arrived soaking wet. I was really cold and had huge goosebumps, but I just smiling at him and gave him a kiss before we went inside. It was hot inside the disco and my clothes dried almost immediately. It got a tiny bit colder, but it was still raining heavily After 10 minutes I was dripping wet again and started to shiver a little. My bf noticed that very quickly and suggested to go anywhere inside. But I didn't wanted to disappoint him, so I just braved the cold and we kept going. We had a very great chat and I got so many kind and sexy compliments from him, but after an hours minutes my feet really began to hurt, cause I'm not used to walk on forest path's in high heels.

So we sat down at a wooden bench near a beautiful lake. Moments after we sat down the rain stopped, but it got very windy. That was good, cause the wind blew all the clouds away and we now had an awesome view and the lake with the moon behind it. But it got really freezing. At some point I just couldn't hold it back anymore and just started to shiver heavily and my skin got blue all over. It wasnt even subzero but my whole body was so wet and the wind coming from the front was just too icy for me. My teeth chattered really loud and my bf put me on his lap and cuddled me. After we cuddled there for at least 30 minutes I was like incredibly freezing and we went to the nearest bus stop and waited around 40 minutes for the bus. I was just freezing so much, my bf had to pay for my ticket, cause I couldnt even stretch out my hand.^^

Yeah so after that we went to my apartment again and spent the rest of the night there.

Hope my grammar was not too bad, XO July :3

daewongkim11

2016-09-08 12:54:07

Ok, just as I promised, the continuation of my Macroeconomics Lecture Saga. So, this course is a once a week for 3 hours type course in the evening (basically so everyone can get it out of the way at once rather than going three times a week for one hour.) I'm sure that's not what you guys care about in the slightest so I'll skip to the good stuff.

I arrived as usual, sat in the same spot about 12 rows back, dead center. As soon as I sat down, the girl walked in the room. She waved and walked over to sit next to me rather than in front. To my shock she was still wearing a tank top and really short shorts but as she got closer I saw she was wearing a black cardigan, so my heart sank a little. We chatted a bit, as we talked I couldn't help but notice she was covered in goosebumps yet again. It was still probably 65F in the room, she wasn't directly under a vent this time but it was still quite cold. She started to rub her arms, and I asked if she was cold. She nodded and said "I'm freezing, can't you see my goosebumps?" I replied that they were kind of a give away, and she laughed and said "I'm always cold, I almost always have goosebumps." I asked her why she doesn't just wear the sweater, pointing to the cardigan in her hand (not sure why I did this) and she said "oh this isn't mine. I'm just returning it to a friend." Her friend eventually showed up and she gave the sweater back to her. I was expecting her to follow her friend to wherever she was sitting, but I was surprised she stayed put next to me. I asked her boldly (again not sure why I did this) why she dresses rather "lightly" if she's cold all the time. She laughed again and said "I really hope that I don't come off as a $%!@ by saying this, but I really like how I look in skimpy clothes. It makes me confident and I feel good about myself. I would much rather be shivering with goosebumps and look sexy, than cover up." It's actually seems to be a more common thing with women than you would think.

So the lecture started, and she progressively got colder and colder. By about the 20 minute mark her teeth started chattering and the chattered most of the remainder of the 3 hours class. When we took a break halfway, she was shivering so hard I couldn't help but hug her again. What I liked so much was that she didn't try to hide how cold she was, but she wasn't annoying or whiny about it. By the 2 hour mark she was shivering so hard other people were starting to notice. Her goosebumps were so big they probably felt like needles in her arms and legs. Finally when the class let out, we hugged one last time and through chattering teeth she said "s-s-s-seee you n-n-next w-w-week!" and walked off.

coldjuly
934
2016-09-12 19:25:56

Hey there. @Goose flesh fan, @Wolfsbane surely I can tell you both of the stories. I begin with the "shivering while ice skating" stuff, cause Wolfsbane was first. Is that okay?

So that's a little longer ago. Winter almost 3 years ago I think. I went ice skating with a very good friend of mine at a outdoor ice rink. She's very talented at sports in general and also a perfect ice skater. I wasn't at that time. Was maybe the third time I went ice skating.

It's quite a long time ago, I cant remember everything. But I probably wore a really short shorts and a tank top and it was hardly above 0°C/32°F. I already had little goosebumps as we arrived. As I first stept onto the ice I felt very uncomfortable and skated very slowly along the edge and slipped several times. But my friend(her name is Kimberly) helped me a lot and every minute I got better and better. At the same time I got colder and colder every second, since my clothes got quite damp and we had a stiff breeze. Soon I felt some big goosebumps and slowly began to shiver.

After almost one hour I felt very good at the ice and went some laps without any help. At that point I was shivering quite a lot, but it was so much fun, so we stayed approx. one hour. Now I had very huge goosebumps and my teeth were chattering loudly. Even Kimberly was cold, although she had a big coat and I only wore a skimpy hotpants and a thin tank top. I was freezing cold all the way home, but it was a great day!

chilly kisses, July

daewongkim11
936
2016-09-18 13:24:34

Goose flesh fan: I am very eager to hear that story from when she got that cold!

Seminar Saga Week 3:

I arrived early like I always do, but by the time class started she wasn't there. I was quite disappointed since she was the main thing that made that long, boring lecture worth it. But, I sat there, took notes, did what I needed to do. Well, class ended and I left, hoping I would see her next week. Well, on Friday I was walking on campus and by sheer luck I ran into her. Now, it cooled down a bit so people are covering up more easily. Well, when I ran into her she was wearing a sleeveless sundress. She smiled when she saw me and hugged me. I asked her where she was on Wednesday and she told me she was sick. She got a terrible virus that she is still getting over. She said that she had a fever of 104 and the worst chills she has ever had in her life. She said she had her winter coat on and 3 blankets and her teeth were still chattering so hard like she was naked in the arctic. Her roommate took her to the hospital. While she was there, they said she needed to let the fever break so she had to strip down because apparently layering up can make the fever worse. She said she shuddered at the thought since she was already so cold, but she did what they told her and stripped down all the way to a white tank top and short shorts. She said that the second the air hit her bare skin she shivered like she never has in her life. She said that her ribcage was aching and her jaw was sore from chattering so much and her goosebumps felt like the hairs were trying to rip out of her skin. She would rub her arms and legs as hard as she could but basically she succumbed to shiver uncontrollaby with goosebumps until the fever broke. Finally after about 30 minutes the fever broke and she warmed up. But she said that after that experience most normal situations where she was cold felt like nothing, so even though she had goosebumps the whole time I was talking to her since she was in a sundress in 65 degrees, and shivered here and there she was barely bothered by it. She hugged me again and said she would DEFINITELY be there next week!

hypothermik
942
2016-11-24 12:46:46

Hi guys! I'm new to this forum, but I've had a browse through some previous posts and I've been really enjoying everybody's stories. I live in Australia so it doesn't get all that cold here, although where I live is only a 2-3 hour drive from the Snowy Mountains so I sometimes go out there to 'cool off'. I've always loved people being exposed to the cold and shivering, and even moreso seeing people (I do have a preference for girls) wearing minimal clothing in obviously freezing temperatures. I admire the perseverance it takes to keep the same sort of wardrobe all year round, and it's great that they can be shivering with lovely goosebumps while still looking gorgeous!

I've only just moved into my own place and can start really getting into full exposure, plus it's still summer here, so I don't have too many stories to share yet but I will share this one, even though it doesn't compare to some of the tough stuff you guys have done!

The first time I drove through the snowies was pretty much the first time I'd ever experienced snow, and wasn't sure what to expect when I left that morning. I decided to wear something casual, just a tank-top and jeans (I'm quite conscious about my body image and that's what is most comfortable for me, so didn't bother trying to wear anything less), figuring that I'd be on the road all day and it gets quite hot in the car with the sun on it all day. I hadn't realised the temps had dropped until I got about halfway and stopped for a break at a little town somewhere in the peaks. The whole place was covered in snow, which was a totally new thing for me at the time, and it was far colder than the town I left from, maybe -3C or -4C in the middle of the day. I dabble in photography and thought it would be cool to take a look around, so I grabbed my camera and left the car and took a walk around town (which was pretty much deserted aside from the post office).

I felt the cold pretty quickly, especially since I wasn't used to it at all. I had goosebumps almost instantly, which were quite visible on my exposed arms, and it was barely a few minutes before the shivering started. I was walking around for maybe an hour in snow about 4inches deep, and since I'd only planned on driving I wasn't wearing snow shoes or anything, so my feet got pretty soaked and only helped to make it feel colder. Eventually I was shivering hard enough that I could barely even hold my camera, let alone take a straight shot, but it felt awesome walking around being fairly exposed. It was a shame there weren't that many people around really! When I got back to the car it took me several attempts to even open it, my hands were so numb and shaking that badly, and once inside I had to sit with the heat up for nearly half an hour just to stop shaking enough to drive home.

Nowadays I almost always have the A/C cranked up when I'm in the car, and if it's cold I'll open up the windows to let the brisk air in. Now that I'm in my own place I can keep the house cold too without annoying my housemates, so this coming winter should be really fun. Looking forward to seeing more of your wonderful stories in the future too!

GoosebumpsForever
943
2016-11-26 15:35:45

Hi Hypothermik, welcome!

Nice story and apropos cold house, I wonder if such a human being exists who could live in a chilly house at say 12C - 14C all the time, just wearing minimal clothes (bare arm and legs) and enjoy it!

Is it possible to train the body to produce enough heat and not get numb fingers and toes all day long. I mean if the body could be totally adapted to say 10 degrees lower temperatures than normal (20-22C), and not needing warm up time between chilly adventures.

coldjuly

2016-11-27 21:43:44

Hey there

I totally forgot about this page. Had so much stuff to do in the last weeks. I'll be online more regularly now.

Yes, winter has finally arrived and we even had snow for some days here in northern Germany, which is quite rare in November.

I really love to wear minimal clothing when there is snow. I mean I like wearing minimal clothing in cold weather in general, but when it's snowing it feels just so much better. I work as a waitress and even though I have to wear a short black skirt, I can barely experience the cold when im at work, cause I'm indoors. But I'm going to work by bike every day and thus I'm covered in goosebumps and slightly shivering every time I arrive at home. I absolutely love that feeling!

I'm looking forward to a ice-cold winter! Also this winter I'm going to do snowboarding again and this time probably only dressed in very skimpy clothing. I'm psyched!

And about 2 month ago I promised '@Goose flesh fan' to share a story, where I broke though the ice accidentally. I'll surely catch up on that soon. sorry. :3

chilly kisses July

Hey wildswimmer

I never wear something over it, regardless of the temperature or if its raining or snowing! When the groud is icy and slippery in the winter, I sometimes consider to walk or take the bus, because I don't wanna fall off my bike. :D But besides that I cycle to and from work everyday.

On my feet I wear normal black leather shoes with a low heel almost everyday Just something comfortable and kinda stylish to walk in the whole day.

And yes the icy feeling is amazing. But cycling wearing a crop top with bare midriff when it's freezing is a absolutely great feeling aswell.

hugs July

coldjuly
950
2016-12-04 19:50:12

Well thank you. :3

It takes roughly 30 minutes by bike and more than an hour walking. So I rather take the bike, cause cycling is not that time consuming.

And yeah of course its heated in the bus. I try to avoid the bus this winter!

Of course people comment on my clothing style. But not that often. I mean when I was walking down the streets downtown yesterday for example, I wore a white minidress and some shoes with small heel. I was kind of an eye-catcher, but only two guys commented me.

Most comments I get are compliments about wearing so little in such freezing conditions, my outfit, my body or me in general. Im always delighted about people commenting, even sexist or offensive people. Obviously there are also a few people shouting at me that I should put some clothes on, that Im next in line for rape or insulting me as a $%!@ or other mean stuff. But thats fine with me and I don't feel offended by that.

NZsilvergirl
970
2017-06-07 11:53:32

This forum is pretty interesting. so many stories throughout the years! Only have time read the first few pages so far. may continue reading as I have time. I am from down south in New Zealand. Winter does get very cold and snow. 3 year ago, I found my first job after uni as a personal assistant to my boss, pretty young for a boss (who is now my bf ^^). As a PA, I have to follow him around every day, sometimes in the evening and even in weekends. As he goes out most of the time for meetings, and events, we don't stay in office much. And during my interview, I have been advised to dress up professional and formal most of the time. since may not have time to change (eg from a late afternoon event, and then to an evening function). I really want this job: 1) I get to dress up everyday; and 2) its such a cool job.

Since my first day of work, my arms and legs are always bare. I started the job in summer so the first few weeks was pretty good. and my boss love the way I dress. As autumn approaches and temperature started to drop, I tried looking for a jacket but was not able to match to my expectation so I did not wear it. It was cold and I get goosebumps often, and occasional shivering but not unbearable. My boss like having events outdoor as he enjoyed nature and only at the final stage involving paperworks that it would be indoor or at our office.

The first time I recalled I was freezing cold that I did not know who I survived was 3 years ago, I still remembered that day the temperature was between -2C low to 6C high because I did not have much to do except looking at my phone lol. It was a cold morning, woke up to -2C, I shivered the moment I left my bed until I got to work. When I arrived to work, 2 colleagues asked me if I am cold and said they have never seen me wore anything warmer. I told them its part of my job to wear like this everyday lol, and they were confused. I made myself hot coffee to stay warm, although the office is semi-heated, it is never warm enough for me because we don't want guys getting too hot and have to take their blazer off (my boss like everyone to be very professional looking). At least I stopped shivering, although still have goosebumps and still a bit cold. My boss gave me a rundown for the day and we are meeting one of his potential partners at their private deck on a hillside at 10am. When we got there, it was quite windy and I was trying my best to look professional and hide my shivers but I started shivering in waves. That's the thing about being a PA, when they are having a conversation, I have to stand still in professionalism in the background. That means I couldn't rub my arms, move my legs or blow on my hands. The only thing I cannot control is my constant shivering but I cannot help it.

After 30mins of talking, the other guy suggested going inside his office as it was freezing and windy. Both my boss and him were wearing multi-layers of clothing with scarfs while my dress is sleeveless and quite short. My thought was that they probably noticed how cold I was and decided to head indoor. But as we were heading inside, the guy told my boss that he would prefer the conversation to be private and asked me to have a seat on the icy bench on the deck. I nodded and took a seat while they walked inside. I took my phone out, it was 10:30am, slightly warmer 3C now. but the hilltop was windy and icy. I have never been that cold before in my life. At least now I can move around instead of standing still. I rubbed my arms and legs for warmth but useless. I alternated between standing and sitting. I was thinking about walking to my boss car and sit inside while waiting but that would make me look unprofessional and I did not know how long their meeting will take. After an hour, still no sign of them coming out. I don't know how long I can last in the weather. I don't even think I have any warmth left in any parts of my body. I just needed something to warm up. I think the only thing that kept me going was being professional and not let my boss down as his PA. At 1:30pm, they finally came out. I have been outside in a thin sleeveless short dress for 3.5 hours! Apparantly they had lunch inside as well. They shook hands, and I smiled at the guy and walked towards the car with my boss. I was almost losing my balance but I mentally told myself to use last bit of my strength to walk properly and not embarrass myself in front of my boss business partner.

When we were out of sight from the house, my boss looked at me and asked if I am cold. I told him why do you ask. He said he has never seen me so cold before. It is worth it if you are happy I said. And He replied back saying I am the best. He also mentioned it was mean of the guy not to let me go inside seeing I was wearing so little but he could not blame him as their conversation was confidential. He put his arms around me as we made our way back to his car :). His car felt like paradise (again like his office, its not the warmest possible as he doesn't like to put heater on high, but it felt good. He could not keep his eyes off my goosebumps shivering bluish arms and legs. That feeling, I had the feel that I have won haha :). He knew I did not have lunch yet and drove to a nearby café, asked me to stay in the car to keep warm and he got me hot chocolate and a sandwich. What a boss!

We made our way towards out next meeting at 3pm. At another outdoor place, with the wind calmer at ground level. Although I still shiver in waves, it was easy compared to the morning. It was dark by the time the meeting finish at 5, we went back to office and my boss invited me for dinner. As winter gets dark quite quickly, I spent a lot of time having dinner with him before going home that winter. We started dating towards the end of the winter season, and I moved into his house before the start of the next winter season (2yrs ago).

The day has not finished as the dinner and the evening was one of the highlights of my life and also one of my coldest (probably not the worst cold experience though). It was probably the day of my life. This is getting long and I am not sure if anyone wants to read on, but if enough interest, I will continue writing part 2 of that day, and possibly share other freezing stories I had over the past 3 years. I am still with him and enjoying our life together.

hypothermik
971
2017-06-07 12:04:00

Hi guys, another story for you. My girlfriend and I were driving a couple hours out of town for a work function of mine when my car got an unexpected flat tyre, so we pulled over to swap it for my spare, which wasn't fun as it had been bucketing down with rain all day and was still going strong. As we hadn't been planning to get out of the car my girlfriend had left her jacket in the boot, so was only wearing a thin t-shirt and fairly short skirt. It was already quite chilly outside, with an air temp of about 4C/39F and an icy bite in the wind as we were driving through the mountains, and I could see she was cold the moment we got out of the car, goosebumps spreading all over her bare arms and legs and starting to shiver as the rain began to soak her. It took a good while to change the tyre, as I've never had to change one before, and by the time we finished she was completely soaked and shivering badly, and I could hear her teeth chattering as we got back into the car. It took her ages to warm back up again, especially since I kept the AC blasting the whole way. (:

Back on 2-05-2014, I posted this on page 105 of this thread:

"Yesterday here in Nashville, it was a dreary cold, gray, and rainy day. It was probably about 38*F here yesterday afternoon. I was at the Aldi store down in south Nashville when I observed an attractive woman there wearing SHORTS!! To whomever you are, thank you for wearing shorts yesterday. You certainly brightened up my day! It was freezing cold yesterday, and drizzly, too. I was wearing layers myself. I remember that day well, because it was the day that I had just gotten laid off from a truly awful temp job. So it was such a treat to go to Aldi and see that woman wearing shorts on such a cold winter day. It really lifted my spirits! I would have rolled down the window and shouted out "NICE LEGS!!" to her, except that she was talking on a cell phone! Bummer! She cost herself a compliment by being on that damn cell phone!

NZsilvergirl2
977
2017-06-14 01:52:05

I forgot the pw and the reset pw does not work. So this will be my new account. (to read my first cold experience, search the username NZsilvergirl) or click here: http://www.misterpoll.com/users/414681

Continuing on from that day. My boss took me to dinner after work at a restaurant. The restaurant was warm and warmed me up. After dinner, he asked if I had time to join him to take photos of the stars in the sky, one of his hobbies. It was a clear night with no clouds. Since I had nothing planned, I went along. He drove to a remote countryside, when I opened the car door, I shivered instantly, an icy breeze and it was even colder than the deck on the hill in the morning. I followed my boss to the trunk of the car where he took out his tripod and a camera bag. He also pointed to his spare jacket and asked me to wear it if I am cold. I told him I am fine. We walked for a few minutes to a grassy area with a bench by the lake. It was a nice view. After he set up his tripod and camera, he asked if we should have a seat on the bench. I preferred standing as I could move around a little for some warmth but I sat down with him nonetheless. It was so cold, I tried my best to make him look I was not cold but could not control my shiver nor my massive goosebumps. Every breeze of wind made me shivered even harder. My bare arms and legs were ice cold to the touch. It seem like he looked at me more than his camera lol.

After an hour, I was shivering so bad and my teeth chattered so loud that my boss actually asked if I am feeling ok or if I wanted to go. As he was not my bf at the time and I would not want to disappoint my boss, I told him I was fine and it was very refreshing with the icy breeze by the lake. He smiled and showed me some of the pictures he took. After about two hours, he said time to go home and sleep and to get ready for another busy day tomorrow. He drove me home and said I was his favourite employee. I smiled back, said thanks and see you tomorrow.

It was definitely a challenging day, in such a thin sleeveless short dress. I was surprised I made it through the 4 hours in the morning and the 2 hours in the evening. But it gave me confidence that I could survive the winter and looked professional. Most of the time was not too bad as I spent more time inside than outside. And most evening events were indoor. Still it was hard wearing so little, due to the amount of outdoor activities my boss had, and temperatue in office or in cars were not all that warm either.

I was once on a cycle tour at the top of an Alpine pass in a snowstorm when a father and daughter arrived in a car. The girl, slim with long blonde hair, was about 12 and was wearing a sleeveless dress - well it looked like a dress but in fact was a top and skirt which didn't quite meet - and open-toed sandals. It was suited for the weather in the valley but not here at the summit where the wind kept blowing it up slightly. She got out to see what view there was - the blonde hairs on her arms standing bolt upright. She was obviously frozen but didn't take any more clothes from their car. I like to think that was because she didn't have any. They wandered around for five minutes before getting back in their car and driving off. I wanted to take a photo but it would have been too obvious. But that picture is still in my mind almost 30 years later.

NZsilvergirl2
982
2017-06-20 07:22:54

Hi everyone, good to see some responses. Thought this thread died since it was started up years ago. To answer a few of your questions:

No, I don't deliberately make myself to feel more cold. I wore short dress mainly as it would suit most situations, from formal meetings, work function, to evening balls, pub and bars etc. I don't adjust my dress in challenging conditions, but I don't think it matters as it would not make me any warmer or colder with what I wear. Most of the time its just my arms and legs and top part of my chest and shoulders are bare. Occasionally, I also wear backless dress. But I do like to look hot and sexy, and professional. I guess the first few months were hardest. As my boss was not my bf yet, and I wanted to do well in my job. I only wanted to impress my boss. So I just tried ignore the cold and the goosebumps. I wouldn't say like or dislike, but I do feel good about myself that I manage to withstand the cold. It was hard especially when outdoor for long period, but definitely satisfying.

Just over a year ago, the company is expanding and my bf asked me to employ another PA to help us out. Also free up my time while in office. The new PA dressed like me, except she would wear a jacket or a winter coat on her way to and from work but would take it off in office. About 3 weeks into her job, after a short meeting between me, my bf and her, we took her out for the first time. As me and my bf had 2 meetings in a row and needed her to help bring a few things back into office after our first meeting. Me and her followed our boss to his car and as the cold breeze hit her after the front office door opened, she said forgot to bring her coat. My bf has already rushed outside to get his car. I told her I will wait for her outside. Maybe she doesn't want us to wait, she said she doesn't need it and we headed out.

The meeting was with one of our business partners, the one with his office up on the hillside (the same one as I shared my first cold experience). When we arrived there, on the deck by the hillside, he saw the new PA so asked her to wait outside. I knew how it felt as it happened to me 2 years ago so I said I will wait outside with her. The weather that day was not too cold, 6C, with a cold breeze but still cold enough for the way we dressed. We sat down on the bench, both of us with our arms and legs covered in goosebumps and shivered in waves, for her a little more as she was probably not as used to the cold. After about 30mins, we alternated between sitting and standing for some movement, and also enjoyed the nice scenery of the view below. About an hour since we were outside, she asked if I know how long the meeting will take and if we come here regularly and if I have to wait outside everytime. I told her that only the first time I came I was asked to wait outside as he was only our potential business partners at the time and needed private conversation with our boss. The other times, I would go inside if they chose to have meetings indoor during winter, and we come 2-3 times a year.

After a little longer, both of us were getting very cold, visible from our skin colour, goosebumps and more frequent shivering. She asked if I am cold and how I coped being a PA for 2 years and outdoor a lot, and also mentioned that she never saw me wore anything warmer. I told her that it is part of the job, to be professional at any time as we won't know when we are needed. Like herself today, she chose not to let the boss wait and did not went back to her desk to get her winter coat when we headed out. She also asked me why we had to wear like we are going to a ball, would a look of an office lady with a suit jacket also quite professional. I then told her we are different to other female employees back in our office because we are PA and first in line with meeting important people. Also, mentioned to her what if we are attending an afternoon meeting and then straight to a dinner ball event or to a bar/pub/club, will be awkward and not too professional to have to get our boss to wait because we have to change and inconvenient to bring 2 sets of clothing to work everyday. She nodded, continued to shiver but did not complain.

We didn't have to wait too long, they came out after 2 hours. While I was quite cold myself, I could see that she was trying very hard to make herself not to look cold in front of our boss and other people. But her shiver, bluish skin, and goosebumps were too obvious. This is more of setting the scene and background about myself than sharing too much of my cold experience. I hope you guys don't mind. Next time, I will share my coldest ever experience in which I believed I had mild hypothermia that day.

FreezingColdGirl
986
2017-06-28 04:35:46

Hi everyone! I can't believe I found this thread! I am a woman in my late 20's, and I LOVE not only seeing other women with goosebumps, chattering teeth, and shivering in the cold (I am bisexual), but I also love being cold myself. I've had this fetish for as long as I can remember, and I'm thrilled to have found others who share it! I have many stories about being cold. I love to seek out situations where I'm "accidentally" under-dressed in cold weather, or just happen to be freezing in front of other people, men in particular. I love it when men seem to enjoy seeing me freeze; it turns me on like nothing else!

Just today, actually, I found myself in such a situation. When I left my house, it was a very nice summer day, about 70 degrees F, and sunny. I was wearing short jean shorts and a light blue tank top with no bra ( my breasts are large, but perky, so I often choose to go without a bra.). I had the day off, so I decided to walk to a local bar, about a mile and a half away, for a couple of drinks in the afternoon. Just a few minutes after I left my house, it began to rain very, very hard. There was lots of thunder and wind, and the temperature dropped about 15 degrees before I even got halfway to the bar. I was immediately soaked to the skin, and I had goosebumps all over my arms and legs because of the wind and the temperature drop. My tank top was practically see-through because of the rain, and my nipples were rock hard and straining against the fabric. I figured there was no point in turning back now, I had come this far. Besides, like I said, I love being cold, so I was already a bit turned on.

When I finally got to the bar, I was (pleasantly) surprised to find that they had the air conditioning on full blast, despite the rain and the severe drop in temperature. I was completely soaked through, my hair was dripping wet, and my goosebumps got even bigger. I hadn't been sitting for more than a minute when I began to shiver. There were three other people (all men) at the bar, watching me from a respectful distance. I could tell they appreciated the view. I'm buddies with the bartender, so he bought me my first drink, since I had walked all that way in the rain. As he made small talk with me, I could tell that he was enjoying watching me. I was so, so cold at that point, being soaked to the bone and in the AC -- I was covered in goosebumps all over my arms, legs, and chest, my rock hard nipples were clearly visible through my soaked tank top, and my teeth were chattering. I rubbed my arms and said, through my chattering teeth, "I'm absolutely freezing!" I could hear one of the other patrons say, "They should turn up the air, this is a great view."

Eventually my bartender buddy offered me a smoke. I accepted, and we went out the back door. The temperature had dropped even more at this point, and it had gotten darker out and the wind had picked up. It was NOT the summer day it had been when I left my house; I was severely underdressed at this point, as it was now around 45 degrees and still raining and windy. As we smoked and made more small talk, my teeth continued to chatter. My clothes were still wet, and my tank top didn't hide much. I was covered in goosebumps, and I began to shiver in uncontrollable, violent waves with the gusts of wind. His shift was ending, so he offered me a ride home, after watching me shiver and shake a bit more. Being so freezing cold, I gladly accepted.

Like I said, I have many other stories of cold situations, including a dunk tank and a few situations with an ex, who loved to watch me shiver. If you guys want to hear more, or if you have any questions for me, let me know!

2017-07-19 18:53:04

Hi guys, it's great to finally find a page/forum that shares my interest in psychrophilia (or so I've self diagnosed myself with)

I've been reading through a few stories and some are great! I'm new to all this and I'm in my early twenties and from the UK. However this Limey bastard isn't homosexual before anyone beats me to it, and I do much prefer seeing Women struggle with cold as I'm a bit of a traditionalist and see it as something to instinctively protect them against. Anyway, enough of my life story and on to a snippet of some important points of second hand experience!

Working in a busy service station between England and Wales enables me to witness hundreds of customers every shift, most of the time different to the ones I served the previous day. We have many large fridge units and in the summer I can sneak into the back office and whack up the AC too.

It was very recently when I did this and was lucky enough to have a skinny Business woman of about 30 years enter the premises and head straight to the Coffee machine, it was about 70 degrees outside but nonetheless I could see millions of goosebumps appear on her uncovered arms straight away, I went closer pretending to date check a few products in the fridge and she rubbed her arms very daintily and wrapped them around herself to protect her from the fridge she was losing her body temperature from.

Even though I'm fairly active inside the building, I find even motionless I don't get cold in there sometimes even in January. Tactically, I joined the inevitably growing queue as it was close to rush hour, and I had a 50% chance of serving the lady in which I was lucky this time. I could see a couple of faint shivers erupt from her body even when she was 2 customers back. Male customers (mainly lorry drivers) had been inside for 4 times as long and didn't react to the temperature drop)

As I served the lady, I realized when she was up close that she had hardly any hair on her arms to insulate her and she had very tanned skin for a mousey blonde lady, so she wasn't used to these relatively chilly temperatures. She was about 5,10 with her platform heels, and her arms didn't increase much in size as she folded them tight to her chest. I asked her slyly whether she was chilly, and she admitted whenever she's hit with the trace of any AC, her limbs turn into ice cubes. She was hiding the extent of her state a bit, but then a couple of minutes later, as she was browsing through some of the phone chargers, she exhaled a short sharp breath and her teeth chattered as fast as a cartoon characters, because she had quite a small teeth, they sounded really high pitched, almost like a girl of half her age. She promptly exited the garage with her arms wrapped tight and her jaw contracting at hyper speed

Outdoor performance in December 2010 by the K-pop group T-ara. It was reportedly -18 degrees Celsius that night and the girl performers were out in short sleeved fishnet one-piece outfits. You can see that the girls are not even able to maintain dance formation at some points because they are so cold.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1qPLXhOOeoA

One of the performers tweeted afterwards,

"People said it was still cold no matter how many layers of hanbok (traditional wear) they were wearing. Short sleeves and a fishnet one-piece... I'd like to apologize to the audience and TV viewers that were surprised. Even now, our car is filled with the sound of coughing."

and

"I seriously felt the mystery of the human body. It felt like my skin was splitting, my joints were hardening, and my eyes were popping out of their sockets."

Denis777
1017
2017-12-05 22:33:59

Coldgirl
1018
2017-12-08 11:20:03

So I used to dress up for winter, like coat, thermal stuff, the whole lot. Then in my last year in university me and some of my friends were going to watch a concert in the winter, and one of my friends, I'll call her Mary, suggested that we all pair up(there were 4 of us)and we would go shopping and chose each other's outfits for the concert. The concert was outdoor one too. So I paired up with Mary and we went shopping. I got her a yellow sundress and a 3" high chunky heel. When I met up with Mary I got the shock of my life, she was holding a black bandeau, a 6" micro skirt(I'm quite short, only 5 3") and I had to wear the skirt so far down to get it to cover my $%!@. I went home thinking I might survive because the temperature was usually around 50 f. The day itself in snowed the night before and the temperature was around 30f. 2018-02-05 11:25:35

Hi all,

Glad to finally find some kindred spirits here :) I've done similar things for my boyfriend as well, he always loves to see me wearing revealing clothing and loves to see me cold and shivering on top of that. Through winter I am always so cold, some days I don't know how I do it haha.

Just after new years my boyfriend and I spent a few days at a cabin by the beach. It's one of our favourite spots and because it's a coastal park it's almost deserted over winter. We decided beforehand that I would give him a special treat and only pack my regular beach clothes (bikinis, tank tops, etc.), the warmest thing I had with me was probably my sundress because it covered the most amount of skin but even that was only very thin fabric, the wind blew straight through it :')

The first day wasn't too bad, when we left in the morning it was about 12C/54F, we drove the two hours to the cabin without heat in the car. I was wearing a thin tank-top and miniskirt and while it was a sunny day so the car warmed up a little, it was still pretty cold and I had goosebumps and some shivering by the time we got there. We unpacked the car and got settled in, the cabin wasn't very well insulated so the only real difference in temperature was the wind chill, which made me nervous but excited for the coming days. We went out for lunch after at this little diner which was thankfully only indoors, everyone there was surprised by what I was wearing but it felt good to be catching so many people's eyes.

We mostly hung out in the cabin for the afternoon with me still shaking a little from the chill, we sat on the couch and my boyfriend liked to rub his hands over the goosebumps on my cold skin and the warmth passing over me made me feel colder. Eventually we decided to go get dinner but as the sun had gone down the temperature had dropped drastically, it was about 2C/35F when we left with an icy wind coming off the ocean now. I got such a shock when we stepped outside and the cold breeze cut right through my clothes. My boyfriend noticed the difference too and I could see how turned on it made him so I stuck with it and we headed out. This time he managed to find a restaurant with an outdoor patio for seating and even though it had a few space heaters around I could still feel the icy chill and was shivering a lot through dinner, especially because he ordered ice cold champagne to go with it and then some small serves of ice cream for dessert, by which time I could barely get the spoon to and from my mouth, my teeth were starting to chatter pretty badly and I was worried they'd break on the spoon. :')

When we got back to the cabin I was really starting to regret my decision to do this but I couldn't back out now and it was all for him, so I tried to stay strong. As the front of our cabin was facing towards the ocean at the edge of the park we could sit outside without anybody seeing us, which he'd planned pretty well because he brought some handcuffs with him and asked to cuff me to the small front deck for some fun. This turned me on as well so despite the cold I agreed and he put the cuffs on me and kept the key in his pocket. He said that he would come back out in an hour and went back inside, leaving me stuck to the deck still wearing only my tank and miniskirt, and no underwear. It had gotten even colder as it was later in the night, he said it was around -3C/27F before he went inside, and I could feel it over every inch of my skin as I sat there shivering, the wind was so icy that it hurt whenever there was a strong gust. That hour felt like eternity, every minute I got colder and colder and my shivering kept getting worse until I could barely control my body at all. I had massive goosebumps and my nipples were so hard and poking so far through my shirt. All I could hear were my teeth chattering like crazy and my shaky breathing, and the cuffs rattling against the deck from how hard I was shaking. I couldn't feel my fingers or toes they were so frozen and by the time he came back out I was worried my bare butt would be frozen to the deck. Eventually he did come back out and untied me and took me inside for some pleasure which warmed me up a little but I still felt freezing afterwards.

I'll go over the night and the following day in another post soon. :)

jacq37
1039
2018-02-18 12:30:14

Anyway so back on my trip, after that we went up to bed, he had all the covers on his side and I only had the single cotton sheet naked. I didn't know this (though my boyfriend probably did) but it was forecast to snow that night, so it got extremely cold through the night and I could hardly sleep with how cold I was. I tried to snuggle up to him as best I could but through all the covers I got no body heat. I doubt he slept much either, he was probably so turned on by me shivering violently up against him all night. :')

When we got up the next morning I was allowed a warm shower and then we sat outside on the deck while we ate breakfast. The snow was several inches deep and it was so cold that morning (I think it was about -12C/10F) that it was really hard and icy, and there was a thick fog over the park and the beach. That day I was wearing my bikini top and 8" mini skirt and even though I'd warmed up a bit from my shower I felt even colder than the day before after just a few minutes outside, our breath was visible in thick clouds and I wash shivering within a couple of minutes. It was sooo hard trying to eat with my shaking hands and chattering teeth and by the time I finished the food was practically iced.

After that we had some fun as he ran his hands over my huge goosebumps and played with my rock-hard nipples, all the while I couldn't stop shivering under his touch. I accidentally bit his lip when we were making out because my teeth were chattering out of control. We then went for a walk along the beach, he was dressed in full winter gear with gloves and boots and everything and I only had my skirt, bikini top and flip-flops. The sand was really wet and icy even up close to the land from all the snow and the moist air but at least it was a little better than walking on the snow had been. We walked for maybe an hour and the whole time I absolutely froze, the wind was really biting and there were a lot of cliffs either side of the beach so there was lots of spray coming from the ocean that made my hair (which was still damp from my morning shower) even more wet and it started to form bits of ice. He told me it warmed up a couple of degrees as we walked but it was still well below freezing and I felt no difference, my hands and feet were so sore and almost numb and it was a struggle to walk, and my skin was really red and starting to turn blue.

As we were heading back he said mischievously that since I was dressed for the beach I should go for a swim. I knew the water would be even worse and fervently shook my head no (my teeth were shaking so bad I couldn't have made a compelling argument if I tried), but he insisted and I gave in and waded in up to my waist. The moment my feet went into the water I started getting cold shock and had to take gasping breaths, it was so cold it didn't even actually feel cold, it was just painful and stinging and got worse the further I went in. I stopped at the waist and begged him to let me come back out but he said I had to go fully in. I just wanted it over with so I dunked my whole body in for only a second but it was enough. I think I blacked out for a couple of seconds from the shock of it before ambling my way back to shore, he held his arms around me as we walked back to the cabin. My shivering was so bad I was practically convulsing and could barely manage to walk and all my extremeties were totally numb so it took us nearly three times as long to get back up the beach. By the time we got back I had ice all in my hair and my skirt and top were practically frozen solid, my lips and skin were really blue and I couldn't stop shaking for hours. I wasn't allowed to dry off but he sat me down on the couch and let me have one of the blankets from the bed and a cup of hot coffee (he could only half fill the cup because otherwise I would spill it since I couldn't stop moving), all I could do was sit there in a daze thinking about how utterly cold I was. He cuddled me and played with me some more until I warmed up a little bit but I was shivering violently like that for hours, I was so tired and sore but it was still cold all day and I shivered all through it. We took it pretty easy for the rest of the day and had sex once or twice to warm back up, but it only lasted until it got dark again and he had more stuff planned, but I'll cut it off here.

Thanks for the positive feedback:)

I was very cold after being buried in the snow my hands feet and arms were numb and my hair started to freeze too.

My boyfriend doesn't have a cold fetish like some of yours but he loves to show me off dressed very little regardless of the weather. I also don't really like the cold but I do it to show off my slim figure and I kind of get used to the cold after so many years anyway.

So someone requested a swimming story so I'll post about one of my most memorable ones. Me and some of my friends were in the woods hiking/trying to show off how long we could last in the cold. I don't remember how cold it was but maybe around 25F it was sunny and not really windy so quite a nice day. We came across a river that was frozen over and I dared my friends to walk across with me. Only 2 of them dared to. We were halfway across when the ice broke and one (I'll call Susan) fell in. Then it triggered some kind of chain reaction and the whole river started to crack and me and my other friend (I'll call Mary) fell in too.i was nearest so I reached the other side first and when Susan tried to climb up the bank I pushed her back in. She grabbed my hand and I fell back in with her and we had some sort of underwater wrestling trying to get up the bank while Mary crawler up the bank and sat there shivering. I might have been able to get up if I wasn't so cold but my fingers were already losing feeling so after a while I just floated in the river. Susan and Mary eventually went upriver to a place where the ice looked thicker and crossed without issue while I tried to swim back. I was shivering so badly I couldn't even grab onto a branch one of the boys stretched out to me it took me a few tries. When I got out even the small wind was so cold my skin was blue the other girls dried off but I didn't and aftet when we started to walk again I kept falling down and my bikini started to freeze. I was lucky we were only about half an hour away from our motel by the time we got there I had stopped shivering I was exhausted and probably close to hypothermia. The next day when I woke up I had a cough and a fever. I'll continue the story if you all want this was a 3 day trip so plenty more cold experiences especially with so many other girls who had good tolerance too.
